anya-e0703n:23: Dīpaṅkarañhi sambuddhaṃ, passitvā no jino purā;
anya-e0703n:24: Lokaṃ dukkhā pamocetuṃ, bodhāya paṇidhiṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:26: Tato tañceva sambuddhaṃ, koṇḍaññaṃ maṅgalaṃ muniṃ;
anya-e0703n:42: Uttamo gotamo buddho, satte dukkhā pamocayi.
anya-e0703n:47: Sattāhāni tahiṃ satta, so vimuttisukhaṃ paraṃ;
anya-e0703n:51: Tattha vassa vasanto’va, saṭṭhiṃ arahataṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:54: Vinetvā ca tato tiṃsa-sahā ye bhaddavaggiye.
anya-e0703n:68: Sāsanujjotanaṃ ṭhānaṃ, laṃkā ñātā jinena hi;
anya-e0703n:69: Yakkhapuṇṇāya laṅkāya, yakkhā nibbā siyāti ca.
anya-e0703n:83: Te bhayaṭṭhā’bhayaṃ yakkhā, ayācuṃ abhayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:84: Jino abhayado āha, yakkhe te’ti bhayaddīte.
anya-e0703n:86: Yakkhā bhayaṃ vo dukkhañca, harissāmi idaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:87: Tumhe nisajjaṭhānaṃ me, samaggā detha no idha.
anya-e0703n:89: Āhu te sugataṃ yakkhā, dema mārisa te idha;
anya-e0703n:90: Sabbepi sakalaṃ dīpaṃ, dehi no abhayaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:92: Bhayaṃ sītaṃ tamaṃ tesaṃ, hantvā taṃ dinnabhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:93: Cammakkhandhaṃ attharitvā, tatthā’ sīno jino tato.
anya-e0703n:96: Ghammābhibhūtā te bhītā, ṭhitā ante samantato.
anya-e0703n:98: Giridīpaṃ tato nātho, rammaṃ tesaṃ idhā’nayi;
anya-e0703n:99: Tesu tattha paviṭṭhesu, yathāṭhāne ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n:101: Nātho taṃ saṃkhipi dhammaṃ, tadā devā samāgamuṃ;
anya-e0703n:102: Tasmiṃ samāgame tesaṃ, satthā dhamma madesayi.
anya-e0703n:105: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, ṭhitā āsuṃ asaṃkhiyā.
anya-e0703n:111: Pāṇimatteadā kese, tassa pāṇa hito jino.
anya-e0703n:143: Bodhito pañcame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino.
anya-e0703n:161: Datvā kālakatā nāgī, mātulena tathā hi so.
anya-e0703n:172: Devo hi so nāgadīpe, manusso’nantare bhave;
anya-e0703n:182: Idaṃ ṭhāna hitatthañca, taṃ sarukkhaṃ idhānayi.
anya-e0703n:185: Tamaṃ tamonudo tesaṃ, nāgānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:188: Te disvā sugataṃ tuṭṭhā, pāde vandiṃsu satthuno.
anya-e0703n:191: Ubho’pi te patītā taṃ, pallaṅkaṃ munino aduṃ.
anya-e0703n:200: Kalyāṇiyaṃ nāgarājā, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ tahiṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:205: Mahatī anukampāno, katā nātha tayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:208: Anukampā mahī pite, visuṃ hotu mahodaya;
anya-e0703n:218: Taṃ bhavissati votātā, hitāya ca sukhāya ca.
anya-e0703n:230: Bodhito aṭṭhame vasse, vasaṃ jetavane jino;
anya-e0703n:246: Uggantvā sumane kūṭe, padaṃ dassesi nāyako.
anya-e0703n:266: Evaṃ laṅkāya nātho, hitamamitamatī āyatiṃ pekkhamāno;
anya-e0703n:280: Rojo ca vararojo ca, tathā kalyāṇakā duve;
anya-e0703n:284: Mucalindo sāgaro ceva, sāgaro deva vanāmako.
anya-e0703n:286: Bharato bhagīratho ceva, ruci ca suruci pica;
anya-e0703n:287: Patāpo mahāpatāpo, panādā ca tathā duve.
anya-e0703n:289: Sudassano ca neru ca, tathā eva duve duve;
anya-e0703n:295: Tato satañca rājano, chappaññāsa ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:296: Caturāsīti sahassāni, chattiṃsā ca tato pare.
anya-e0703n:298: Dvattiṃsa aṭṭhavīsā ca, dvāvīsati tato pare;
anya-e0703n:301: Nava satta dvādasa ca, pañcavīsa tatopare;
anya-e0703n:302: Pañcavīsaṃ dvādasa ca, dvādasañca navā pica.
anya-e0703n:307: Soḷasa yāva okkātaṃ, paputtā rāsito ime;
anya-e0703n:308: Visuṃ visuṃ pure rajjaṃ, kamato anusāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:311: Nipuro candīmā candaṃ-mukho ca sivi sañjayo.
anya-e0703n:314: Sīhassaro ca iccete, tassa putta pa puttakā.
anya-e0703n:317: Putta pa putta rājāno, jayaseno tadantimo.
anya-e0703n:325: Añjano cā’tha kaccānā, āsuṃ tassa sutā duve;
anya-e0703n:329: Añjanassa duve dhītā, māyā cātha pajāpati.
anya-e0703n:331: Puttā duve daṇḍapāṇī, suppabuddho ca sākiyo;
anya-e0703n:332: Pañca puttā duve dhītā, āsuṃ sīhahanussare.
anya-e0703n:335: Amitā pamitācā’ti, ime pañca imā duve.
anya-e0703n:341: Suddhodana mahārañño, putto māyāya so jino.
anya-e0703n:344: Evaṃ pavatte sañjāto, sabba khatthiya muddhani.
anya-e0703n:350: Ubhinnaṃ pitaro cāpi, sahāyāeva te ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:355: Padahitvāna chabbassaṃ, bodhiṃ patvā kamena ca;
anya-e0703n:359: Abhisitto mahāpañño, patto rajjassa tassa tu.
anya-e0703n:362: Dvāpaññāseva vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi so pana.
anya-e0703n:371: Pacchā so kārayī rajjaṃ, vassāni catuvīsati.
anya-e0703n:384: Ṭhatvā sabbāni kiccāni, katvā lokassa sabbathā.
anya-e0703n:390: Khattiyā brāhmaṇā vassā, suddhā devā tatheva ca.
anya-e0703n:411: Sammanni kātuṃ saṃgītiṃ, sā na sakkā hi taṃ vinā.
anya-e0703n:435: Rājā katthāti pucchitvā, vuttaṭhānamhi tehi so.
anya-e0703n:440: Sabbathā maṇḍayitvā taṃ, attharāpesi tattha so;
anya-e0703n:449: Rājā’rocayi therānaṃ, kammaṃ no niṭṭhitaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:452: Sve sannipāto ānanda, sekhena gamanaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:453: Na yuttante sadatthe tvaṃ, appamatto tato bhava.
anya-e0703n:455: Iccevaṃ codito thero, katvāna vīriyaṃ samaṃ;
anya-e0703n:458: Vassānaṃ dutiye māse, dutiye divase pana;
anya-e0703n:459: Rucire maṇḍape tasmiṃ, therā sannipatiṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:504: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā, therā sabbepi nibbutā.
anya-e0703n:535: Kāḷāso ko tassa putto, aṭṭhavīsati kārayi.
anya-e0703n:547: Taṃ sutvāna yasatthero, evaṃ vajjīsu cārikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:555: Na kappate taṃ mā detha, iti thero savārayi;
anya-e0703n:558: Yācitvā anudūtaṃ so, saha tena puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:564: Thero uggamma nabhasā, gantvā kosambiyaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n:573: Bhikkhavo sannipatitā, sabbe tattha tato tato;
anya-e0703n:577: Taṃ kālapamukhaṃ ñatvā, passituṃ nikkhamiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:579: Thero tammantanaṃ sutvā, vesāliṃ gantumeva so;
anya-e0703n:600: Upecca taṃ mahābrahmā, dhamme niṭṭhāti abravi;
anya-e0703n:601: Niccaṃ dhamme ṭhitattaṃ so, attano tassa abravi.
anya-e0703n:604: Thero na gaṇhi tappakkha-gāhī sissaṃ paṇāmayī.
anya-e0703n:606: Vesāliṃ te tato gantvā, tato pupphapuraṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n:609: Satthussa no gandhakuṭiṃ, gopayanto mayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:619: Navutiñca sahassāni, ahu taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:622: Thero sabbepi bhikkhū te, vesālimāgamuṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:627: Pesetvā te mahīpālo, taṃ rattiṃ supinenaso;
anya-e0703n:630: Atibhīto ahu rājā, tamassā setu māgamā;
anya-e0703n:633: Bhāriyaṃ te kataṃ kammaṃ, dhammike’yye khamāpaya;
anya-e0703n:634: Pakkho tesaṃ bhavitvā tvaṃ, kuru sāsanapaggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:636: Evaṃ kate sotthi tuyhaṃ, hessatīti apakkami;
anya-e0703n:642: Khamāpetvā dhammike te, bhikkhū sabbe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:646: Datvā ca tesaṃ ārakkhaṃ, agamāsi sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:648: Nicchetuṃ tāni vatthūni, saṅgho sannipatī tadā;
anya-e0703n:652: Ubbhāhikāya taṃ vatthuṃ, sametuṃ nicchayaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:655: Ubbhāhikāya sammanni, bhikkhū taṃ vatthu santiyā.
anya-e0703n:668: Daharenā’ji te nettha, paññatte āsane subhe;
anya-e0703n:671: Tesu vatthūsu ekekaṃ, kamato revato mahā;
anya-e0703n:672: Thero theraṃ sabbakāmiṃ, pucchi pucchāsu kovido.
anya-e0703n:675: Sabbāni tāni vatthūni, na kappantīti suttato.
anya-e0703n:692: Vāsabhagāmiko ceva, sumano ca duve pana.
anya-e0703n:695: Aṭṭha therā’pi dhaññā te, diṭṭhapubbā tathāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:709: Pubbe kataṃ tathā eva, dhammaṃ pacchā ca bhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:710: Ādāya niṭṭhapesuṃ taṃ, etaṃ māsehi aṭṭhahi.
anya-e0703n:741: Vajjīputtakabhikkhū ca, duve jātā ime khalu.
anya-e0703n:747: Dhammaguttiyabhikkhū ca, jātā khalu ime duve.
anya-e0703n:750: Jātā saṅkantikā bhikkhū, suttavādā tato pana.
anya-e0703n:752: Theravādena saha te, honti dvādasi’mepi ca;
anya-e0703n:753: Pubbe vuttachavādā ca, iti aṭṭhārasā khilā.
anya-e0703n:769: Nava nandā tato āsuṃ, kameneva narādhipā;
anya-e0703n:781: Bindusārasutā āsuṃ, sataṃ eko ca vissutā;
anya-e0703n:784: Vemātike bhātaro so, hantvā ekūnakaṃ sataṃ;
anya-e0703n:794: Yojane yojane āṇā, niccaṃ pavattitā ahu.
anya-e0703n:797: Devā devo akā tehi, saṃvibhāgaṃ janassaca.
anya-e0703n:821: Akaṃsu mūsikā tehi, bhattaṃ rājakule ahu.
anya-e0703n:836: Bhojesi sopi teyeva, tīṇi vassāni bhojayi.
anya-e0703n:848: Sumanassa kumārassa, putto so hi kumārako.
anya-e0703n:853: Katvā puraṃ sakāyattaṃ, mate pitari bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:854: Ghātetvā jeṭṭhakaṃ rajjaṃ, aggahesi pure vare.
anya-e0703n:862: Tadahe’va varaṃ puttaṃ, vijāyitvā sutassa sā;
anya-e0703n:865: Disvā taṃ jeṭṭhacaṇḍālo, attano sāminiṃ viya;
anya-e0703n:868: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:880: Pubbe kira tayo āsuṃ, bhātaro madhu vāṇijā;
anya-e0703n:881: Eko madhuṃ vikkiṇāti, āharanti madhuṃ duve.
anya-e0703n:887: Titthaṃ jalatthaṃ gacchanti, ekā ceṭī tamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:890: Eso madhvāpaṇo bhante, tattha gacchā’ti abravi.
anya-e0703n:892: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
anya-e0703n:896: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
anya-e0703n:899: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṃ yojaneti ca.
anya-e0703n:901: Bhātare āgate āha, edisassa madhuṃ adaṃ;
anya-e0703n:902: Anumodatha tumhe taṃ, tumhākañca yato madhu.
anya-e0703n:912: Āpaṇā desikaṃ yātu, devittaṃ tassa patthayi;
anya-e0703n:918: Caṇḍālavādī caṇḍāla-gāme āsi yato tu so;
anya-e0703n:919: Patthesi mokkhaṃ mokkhañca, satta vassova pāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n:921: Niviṭṭhapemo tasmiṃ so, rājā’ti turito tato;
anya-e0703n:922: Pakkosāpesi taṃ so tu, santavuttī upāgami.
anya-e0703n:928: Ajjā’yaṃ sāmaṇero me, ghare hessati sāmiko.
anya-e0703n:930: Ālambitvā karaṃ rañño, so pallaṅke samāruhi;
anya-e0703n:933: Disvā tathā nisinnaṃ taṃ, asoko so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:940: Taṃ sutvā bhūmipālo so, pasanno jinasāsane.
anya-e0703n:942: Aṭṭha te niccabhattāni, dammi tātā’ti āha taṃ;
anya-e0703n:943: Upajjhāyassa me rāja, tāni dammīti āha so.
anya-e0703n:945: Puna aṭṭhasu dinnesu, tāna’dā cariyassa so;
anya-e0703n:951: Sahatthā tappito raññā, dhammaṃ desiya bhūpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:956: Tato rājā pasanno so, diguṇena dine dine;
anya-e0703n:966: Gharaṃ netvāna bhojetvā, datvā sāmaṇakaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:981: Paccekaṃ satasahassaṃ, so dāpesi dine dine.
anya-e0703n:990: Te piṭakānaṃ therānaṃ, saṭṭhiye’kaṃ dine dine.
anya-e0703n:1008: Rūpaṃ anantañāṇassa, dassehi mama bho iti.
anya-e0703n:1014: Taṃ disvā’ti pasādassa, vimhayassa ca pūrito.
anya-e0703n:1016: Etena nimmitaṃ rūpaṃ, īdisaṃ kīdisaṃ nukho;
anya-e0703n:1022: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo ca, saddho cāpi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1023: Thero ca moggaliputto, diṭṭhā pubbe vasīhi te.
anya-e0703n:1040: Upaddavo sāsanassa, na sambhossāma taṃ mayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1048: Kāle tumhesu eko taṃ, pabbājetu kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1063: Vedesu gaṇṭhiṭhānāni, pucchi so tāni byākari.
anya-e0703n:1066: Sabbe dhammā osaranti, ekadhammo hi ko nu so.
anya-e0703n:1068: Iccāha nāmaṃ sandhāya, thero māṇavako tu so;
anya-e0703n:1071: Dehīti āha so āha, dema no vesadhārino;
anya-e0703n:1072: Guruṃ āpucchi mantatthaṃ, mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1089: Sagaṇaṃ dāsakaṃ theraṃ, tattha disvā pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1090: Pabbajjaṃ yāci so āha, tavā’puccha guruṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1120: Pāhesuṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, vuṭṭhāya sa tahiṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:1122: Kumāro pucchi kiṃ bhante, nālapitthāti āha so;
anya-e0703n:1123: Bhuñjimha bhuñjitabbanti, āha bhojetha no api.
anya-e0703n:1125: Āha amhādise jāhe, sakkā bhojayituṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:1134: Ñatvā tissa paṭisandhiṃ, tato pabhuti siggavo;
anya-e0703n:1135: Thero so sattavassāni, taṃ gharaṃ upasaṅkami.
anya-e0703n:1138: Alattha aṭṭhame vasse, gacchāti vacanaṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:1141: Kiñci laddhaṃ ghare noti, pucchi āmāti so’bravi.
anya-e0703n:1143: Gharaṃ gantvāna pucchitvā, dutiye divase tato;
anya-e0703n:1146: Therassa vacanaṃ sutvā, so pasannamano dvijo;
anya-e0703n:1150: Bhojāpesi dijo niccaṃ, nisīdāpiya taṃ ghare.
anya-e0703n:1159: Tasmā so tassa pallaṅko, vāsayitvā lagīyati.
anya-e0703n:1162: Tassa taṃ āsanaṃ tassa, paññapesi ghare jano.
anya-e0703n:1167: Thero māṇava kiṃ mantaṃ, jānāsīti tamabravi;
anya-e0703n:1168: Tameva pucchaṃ therassa, pacchā rocesi māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:1179: Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhisati na uppajjissati;
anya-e0703n:1182: Taṃ cittayamake pañhaṃ, pucchi thero visārado;
anya-e0703n:1183: Andhakāro viya ahu, tassa so tamavoca so.
anya-e0703n:1185: Bhikkhuko nāma mantoti, buddha mantoti so bravi;
anya-e0703n:1186: Dehīti vutte novesa-dhārino dammi taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1192: Sotāphattiphalaṃ patto, thero ñatvāna taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1204: Ekāhaṃ uparājā so, adakkhi migavaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1210: Attano cintitaṃ rañño, ārocesi gharaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:1211: Saññāpetuṃ tu sattāhaṃ, rajjaṃ tassa adāsi so.
anya-e0703n:1213: Anubhohi ime rajjaṃ, sattāhaṃ tvaṃ kumāraka;
anya-e0703n:1221: Sattāhā’haṃ marissaṃti, tvaṃ na kīḷi ime kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1224: Iccevaṃ bhākarā vutto, sāsanasmiṃ pasīdi so;
anya-e0703n:1230: Ayaṃ thero viyā’hampi, pabbajja jina sāsane;
anya-e0703n:1231: Viharissaṃ kadā raññe, iti cintayi paññavā.
anya-e0703n:1241: Taṃ iddhiṃ uparājā so, disvā’tīva pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1273: Janena paribhuttesu, ṭhānesu ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1282: Pure bheriṃ carāpesi, sattame divase ito;
anya-e0703n:1306: Tasmiṃ samāgame āsuṃ, asīti bhikkhukoṭi yo;
anya-e0703n:1310: Khiṇāsavā bhikkhuniyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu tu.
anya-e0703n:1319: Passi sabbe vihāre ca, nānāpūjā vibhūsite.
anya-e0703n:1321: Atīva tuṭṭho te disvā, saṅghaṃ pucchi nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n:1324: Thero so moggaliputto, rañño pañhaṃ viyākari;
anya-e0703n:1327: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ bhiyyo, tuṭṭho rājā apucchi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1328: Buddhasāsana dāyādo, hoti kho mādiso iti.
anya-e0703n:1347: Pabbajissatha kiṃ tātā, pabbajjā mahatī matā;
anya-e0703n:1348: Pituno vacanaṃ sutvā, pitaraṃ te abhāsisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1350: Ajjeva pabbajissāma, sace tvaṃ deva icchasi;
anya-e0703n:1360: Pabbajjā pesi samahaṃ, saṅgha mittañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:1366: Pabbajjā sikkhādānañca, tassā ca tadahu ahu.
anya-e0703n:1383: Sā bhikkhunī candalekhā, mahindo bhikkhū sūriyo;
anya-e0703n:1384: Sambuddha sāsanākāsaṃ, te sadā sobhayuṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:1398: Āha puṭṭho kaṇiṭṭhena, bhesajjaṃ pasataṃ ghaṭaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1403: Piṇḍāya ce caraṃ sappiṃ, labhase tvaṃ tamāhara;
anya-e0703n:1406: Piṇḍāya caratā tena, na laddhaṃ pasataṃ ghataṃ;
anya-e0703n:1428: Mā hotu bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhesajjaṃ dullabhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1438: Tato pabhuti saṅghassa, lābho’tīva mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n:1439: Pacchā pasannā ca janā, yasmā lābhaṃ pavattayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1458: Titthiyānaṃ bahucattā ca, dubbaccattā ca bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n:1459: Tesaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhiṃsu, dhammena paṭisedhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1473: Uposathaṃ tittiyehi, na karoma mayaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:1474: Avo ca bhikkhusaṅgho taṃ, amaccaṃ mūḷhamānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1479: Rājabhātā tissatthero, taṃ disvā kiriyaṃ lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1480: Gantvāna tassa āsanne, sāsanamhi nisidi so.
anya-e0703n:1482: Theraṃ disvā amacco so, gantvā rañño nivedayi;
anya-e0703n:1483: Sabbaṃ pavattiṃ taṃ sutvā, jātadāho mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:1486: Evaṃ katena kammena, kassa pāpaṃ siyā iti.
anya-e0703n:1488: Tesaṃ apaṇḍitā keci, pāpaṃ tuyhanti keci tu;
anya-e0703n:1491: Taṃ sutvā’ha mahārājā, samattho atthi bhikkhuna;
anya-e0703n:1503: Theraṃ ānetu me tehi, tathā vutte sanāgami.
anya-e0703n:1505: Taṃ sutvā puna aṭṭha’ttha, there’macce ca pesayi;
anya-e0703n:1508: Rājā pucchi kathaṃ thero, āgaccheyya nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n:1512: Iti vutte mahārāja, thero essati so iti.
anya-e0703n:1514: Punāpi thero’macce ca, rājā soḷasa soḷasa;
anya-e0703n:1515: Visuṃ sahassa purise, tathā vatvāna pesayi.
anya-e0703n:1518: Theraṃ gaṅgāya nāvāya, ānethā’ti ca abravi.
anya-e0703n:1532: Therassa pāde dhovitvā, makkhetvā ca nisīdiya.
anya-e0703n:1537: Kanti vutte mahīkampaṃ, āha taṃ puna rāhaso;
anya-e0703n:1540: Ko dukkaroti pucchitvā, eka desāya kampanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1546: Ṭhapāpetvā tadaḍḍhehi, saha taṃ yojanaṃ mahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1547: Cālesi iddhiyā tatra, nisinnassa ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n:1552: Paṭicca kammaṃ natthīti, kiliṭṭhaṃ cetanaṃ vinā;
anya-e0703n:1558: Tasmiṃyeva ca sattā he, duve yakkhe mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1567: Kiṃvādī sugato bhante, iti pucchi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:1573: Apucchi dhammike bhikkhū, kiṃvādī sugato iti;
anya-e0703n:1574: Vibhajjavādī tāhaṃsu, taṃ theraṃ pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:1586: Saṅghassa rakkhaṃ datvāna, nagaraṃ pāvisī subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1596: Yathā te dhamma saṃgītiṃ, tissattheropi taṃ tathā.
anya-e0703n:1599: Abhāsi tissatthero ca, tasmiṃ saṃgīti maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n:1602: Ayaṃ navahi māsehi, dhamma saṃgīti niṭṭhitā.
anya-e0703n:1623: So rājā deviyā tassā, ekaṃ alabhi dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1635: Gaṇhitvā gocaraṃ sīho, gacchaṃ disvā tamā’rato;
anya-e0703n:1638: Sā taṃ disvā saritvāna, nemittavacanaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1642: Sīho sakaṃ guhaṃ netvā, tāya saṃvāsamācari.
anya-e0703n:1650: Putto soḷasavasso so, mātaraṃ pucchi saṃsayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1651: Tuvaṃ pitā ca no amma, kasmā visadisā iti.
anya-e0703n:1660: Vāme kaṇiṭṭhiṃ katvāna, tayo sīghaṃ apakkamī.
anya-e0703n:1668: Disvā te pucchite’vocuṃ, aṭavī vāsino mayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1669: Iti so dāpayī tesaṃ, vatthāni dhajinī pati.
anya-e0703n:1674: Tena so vimhito pucchi, ke tumheti camūpati;
anya-e0703n:1677: Pitucchā dhītaraṃ taṃ so, ādāya dhajinī pati;
anya-e0703n:1680: Sīho sīghaṃ guhaṃ gantvā, te adisvā tayo jane;
anya-e0703n:1681: Aṭṭito puttasokena, na ca khādi na cā’pivi.
anya-e0703n:1684: Ubbāsīyati so so’va, yaṃyaṃ gāmamupeti so.
anya-e0703n:1687: Sīho piḷeti te raṭṭhaṃ, taṃ deva paṭisedhaya.
anya-e0703n:1693: Dvīsu vāresu vāresi, mātā sīhabhujaṃ hitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1696: Mātaraṃ tisahassaṃ taṃ, ghātetuṃ pitaraṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1698: Rañño kumāraṃ dassesuṃ, taṃ rājā idha mabravi;
anya-e0703n:1699: Gahito yadi sīho te, dammi raṭṭhaṃ tadeva te.
anya-e0703n:1701: So taṃ gantvā guhādvāraṃ, sīhaṃ disvāva ārakā;
anya-e0703n:1702: Entaṃ puttasinehena, vijjhituṃ taṃ saraṃ khipi.
anya-e0703n:1708: Tato khitto sarotassa, kāyaṃ nibbijja nikkhami.
anya-e0703n:1713: Rañño aputtakattā ca, patītā cassa kammunā;
anya-e0703n:1714: Sutvā ca rañño nattuttaṃ, sañjānitvā ca mātaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:1719: So rajjaṃ sampaṭicchitvā, datvā mātu patissa taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1722: Nagaraṃ tattha māpesi, ahu sīhapuranti taṃ;
anya-e0703n:1728: Mahesī soḷasakkhattuṃ, yamake ca duve duve;
anya-e0703n:1729: Putte janayi kālesā, vijayo nāma jeṭṭhako.
anya-e0703n:1731: Sumitto nāma dutiyo, sabbe dvattiṃsa puttakā;
anya-e0703n:1738: Rājā te saññapetvāna, puttaṃ ovadi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:1740: Sabbaṃ tatheva dutiyaṃ, ahosi tatiyaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:1741: Kuddho mahājano āha, puttaṃ ghātehi te iti.
anya-e0703n:1747: Tathā tesaṃ bhariyāyo, tatheva ca kumārake.
anya-e0703n:1750: Visuṃ visuṃ dīpakasmiṃ, okkamiṃsu vasiṃsu ca.
anya-e0703n:1791: Na santi manujā hettha, na ca hessati vo bhayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1792: Iti vatvā kuṇḍīkāya, te jalena nisiñciya.
anya-e0703n:1800: Tassā ca sāmīnī tattha, kuveṇīnāma yakkhinī;
anya-e0703n:1803: Disvāna so pokkharaṇī, nisinnaṃ tañca tāpasiṃ;
anya-e0703n:1804: Tattha nhātvā pivitvā ca, ādāya ca mulāliyo.
anya-e0703n:1807: Bhakkho’si mama tiṭṭhāti, aṭṭhā baddho vaso naro.
anya-e0703n:1809: Parittasutta tejena, bhakkhituṃ sā na sakkuṇī;
anya-e0703n:1812: Taṃ gahetvā suruṅgāyaṃ, rudantaṃ yakkhinī khipi;
anya-e0703n:1826: Yakkhinī tāva jānāti, mama jātinti nicchito;
anya-e0703n:1827: Saṅghaṃ sanāmaṃ sāvetvā, dhanuṃ sandhāyu’ pāgato.
anya-e0703n:1829: Yakkhiṃ ādāya gīvāya, nārā ca valayena so;
anya-e0703n:1830: Vāmahatthena kesesu, gahetvā dakkhiṇe na tu.
anya-e0703n:1835: Jīvitaṃ dehi me sāmi, rajjaṃ dajjāmi te ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1838: Adubbhātthāya sapathaṃ, so taṃ yakkhiṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n:1862: Apucchi sahasemānaṃ, kiṃ saddo iti yakkhiniṃ.
anya-e0703n:1864: Rajjañca sāmino deyyaṃ, sabbe yakkhe ca ghātiya;
anya-e0703n:1867: Iti cintiya yakkhī sā, abravi rājanandanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1871: Kumārikā idhā’nītā, tassā mātā ca āgatā.
anya-e0703n:1873: Āvāha maṅgale tattha, idhāpi ussave mahā;
anya-e0703n:1881: Yattha saddaṃ karissāma, tena saddena ghātaya;
anya-e0703n:1884: Tassā sutvā tathā katvā, sabbe yakkhe aghātayi;
anya-e0703n:1897: So desoceva dīpo ca, tena tannāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:1900: Sīhaḷo tena sambandhā, ete sabbepi sīhaḷā.
anya-e0703n:1902: Tattha tattha ca gāme te, tassā’maccā nivesayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1908: Aññe tayo amaccā te, māpayiṃsu visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1914: Iti vutto rājaputto, na icchi abhisecanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1917: Athāmaccā sāmino he, abhiseka katā darā;
anya-e0703n:1924: Aññesaṃ cāpi dhītatthaṃ, amaccānaṃ janassa ca.
anya-e0703n:1926: Sīghaṃ nāvāya gantvāna, dūtā te madhuraṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1927: Paṇṇākāre ca lekhañca, tassa rañño adassayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:1938: Evaṃ laddhā bahūkaññā, tappayitvāna taṃ kulaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1941: Sabbā tā laddhasakkārā, kaññāyo ca yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:1953: ‘‘Gaccha dāni tuvaṃ bhoti, ṭhapetvā puttake duve;
anya-e0703n:1956: Sutvā taṃ yakkhabhayato, bhītaṃ taṃ āha yakkhiniṃ;
anya-e0703n:1957: Mā cintayi sāhassena, dāpayissāmi te baliṃ.
anya-e0703n:1959: Punappunaṃ taṃ yācitvā, ubho ādāya puttake;
anya-e0703n:1962: Putte bihi nisīdetvā, sayaṃ pāvisi taṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:1963: Sañjānitvāna taṃ yakkhiṃ, bhītā corīti saññito.
anya-e0703n:1965: Saṃkhubhiṃsu pure yakkhā, eko sāhasiko pana;
anya-e0703n:1968: Tassātu mātulo yakkho, nikkhamma nagarā bahi;
anya-e0703n:1969: Disvā te dārake pucchi, tumhe kassa sutā iti.
anya-e0703n:1971: Kuveṇiyā’ti sutvā’ha, mātā vo māritā idha;
anya-e0703n:1972: Tumhepi disvā māreyyuṃ, palāyatha lahuṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:1974: Āguṃ sumanakūṭaṃ te, palāyitvā tato lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:1975: Vāsaṃ kappesi jeṭṭho so, vuddho tāya kaṇiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n:1984: Adā yāthārahaṃ kaññā, amaccānaṃ janassa ca.
anya-e0703n:1986: Yathā vidhi ca vijayaṃ, sabbe maccāsamāgatā;
anya-e0703n:1989: Tato so vijayo rājā, paṇḍurājassa dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2005: Vijayo so mahārājā, vasse antimake ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:2006: Iti cintayi ‘‘vuddho’haṃ, na ca vijjati me suto.
anya-e0703n:2008: Kicchena vāsitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, nasseyya mama accaye;
anya-e0703n:2012: Lekhaṃ datvāna vijayo, na cirena divaṅgato.
anya-e0703n:2014: Tasmiṃ mate amaccā te, pekkhantā khattiyāgamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2018: Ekaṃ vassaṃ ayaṃ laṃkā-dīpo āsi arājako.
anya-e0703n:2021: Accayena sumitto so, rājā tassa suto ahu.
anya-e0703n:2023: Tassa puttā tayo āsuṃ, maddarājassa dhītuyā;
anya-e0703n:2024: Dūtā sīhapuraṃ gantvā, rañño lekhaṃ adaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:2026: Lekhaṃ sutvāna so rājā, putte āmantayī tayo;
anya-e0703n:2027: Ahaṃ mahallako tātā, eko tumhesu gacchatu.
anya-e0703n:2029: Laṃkaṃ nekaguṇaṃ kantaṃ, mama bhātussa santakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2030: Tassa’cca yena tattheva, rajjaṃ kāretu sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2039: Te paribbājake disvā, jano sakkari sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2041: Pucchitvā nagaraṃ ettha, upayantaṃ kamena te;
anya-e0703n:2045: Khattiyā’gamanaṃ tassa, so byākāsi paraṃpi ca.
anya-e0703n:2051: Patte disvāna pucchitvā, amaccā te vijāniya.
anya-e0703n:2057: Ñatvā vināsaṃ sakyānaṃ, so ādāya sakaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2060: Māpetvā tattha kāresi, rajjaṃ tassa sute labhi.
anya-e0703n:2066: Pesesuṃ rājino tassa, bhīto rājūhi so pana.
anya-e0703n:2071: Gaṅgāya khipi gaṇhātu, pahu me dhītaraṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:2072: Gahetuṃ te na sakkhiṃsu, nāvāsāpana sīghagā.
anya-e0703n:2075: Pattāpabbajitā kārā, sabbā tā tattha otaruṃ.
anya-e0703n:2080: Nemittakassa vacanaṃ, sutvā tatthā’gatā tu tā;
anya-e0703n:2081: Disvā amacco pucchitvā, ñatvā rañño samappayi.
anya-e0703n:2096: Mahesī janayī putte, dasa ekañca dhītaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2103: Vāresi kāle vāsesuṃ, gehaṃ taṃ ekathuṇike.
anya-e0703n:2106: Anto ṭhapesuṃ ekañca, dāsiṃ narasataṃ bahi.
anya-e0703n:2115: Disvāna taṃ kaniṭṭhiñca, roditvā saha tāya ca.
anya-e0703n:2126: Kāresi anurādho so, vāpiṃ dakkhiṇato tato;
anya-e0703n:2150: Evaṃ niccaṃ vasī tattha, chiddābhāvā apākaṭo.
anya-e0703n:2152: Sā tena aggahī gabbhaṃ, gabbhe pariṇate tato;
anya-e0703n:2153: Mātu ārocayī dāsī, mātā pucchiya dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:2156: Posiyoso’pi amhehi, deva tasseva taṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:2158: Putto ce mārayissāma, ta’nti tassa adaṃsu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:2164: Te paṭiññaṃ adente te, rājaputtā aghātayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2165: Yakkhā hutvāna rakkhiṃsu, ubho gabbhe kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2167: Aññaṃ upavijaññaṃ sā, sallakkhā pesi dāsiyā;
anya-e0703n:2168: Cittā sā janayī puttaṃ, sā itthi pana dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:2170: Cittaṃ sahassaṃ dāpetvā, tassā puttaṃ sakampi ca;
anya-e0703n:2173: Dhītā laddhā’ti sutvāna, tuṭṭhā rājasutā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2174: Mātā ca mātumātā ca, ubho pana kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2180: Tiṃsa vassamhi jātamhi, mato so paṇḍukābhaye.
anya-e0703n:2196: Disvā dāsiṃ kuhiṃ yāsi, kiṃ me kanti ca pucchisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2201: Citto ca kālavelo ca, tassā’rakkhāya niggatā;
anya-e0703n:2207: Tasmiṃyeva dine tassa, bhariyā janayī sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2208: Yamake janayī putte, bhariyaṃ me’ti positaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2210: So sattavassiko cā’si, taṃ vijāniya mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2211: Gantuṃ sarasi kīḷante, dārake ca payojayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2220: Kumāro vārimo gayha, susiramhi ṭhito ahu.
anya-e0703n:2223: Gantvā ārocayuṃ sabbe, dārakā māritā iti.
anya-e0703n:2225: Gatesu tesu so gantvā, āyuttakagharaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2228: Puna sutvāna jīvantaṃ, kumāraṃ tassa mātulaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2231: Tasmiṃ ahani gopālā, laddhā ekaṃ catuppadaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2232: Aggiṃ āharituṃ gāmaṃ, pesetuṃ taṃ kumārakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2235: Pādā rujanti me tehi, aggiṃ gopālasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2239: Ne si so taṃ vaco sutvā,
anya-e0703n:2242: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pesitā te, parikkhipiya mārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2245: Tatho soḷasavassaṃ taṃ, vijāniṃsu ca mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2257: Tassa katvāna sakkāraṃ, āha rājā bhavissasi;
anya-e0703n:2261: Candena tassa puttena, khippaṃ sippaṃ samāpitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2266: Siyuṃ yāya gayitāni, paṇṇāni kanakāni taṃ;
anya-e0703n:2269: Ibhi vatvā dhanaṃ datvā, sayodhaṃ nihari tato;
anya-e0703n:2270: So nāmaṃ sāvayitvāna, tato nikkhamma puññavā.
anya-e0703n:2281: So karisasataṃ pakkaṃ, tadā lāveti khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:2282: Tassa dhītā rūpavatī, pālī nāmā’si khattiyā.
anya-e0703n:2290: Dvedhā taṃ parisaṃ katvā, sataṃ yānamapesayi;
anya-e0703n:2305: Sabbe bhojāpayī tesā, taṃ na khīyittha bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2314: Taṃ sutvāna pitā tassā, nare sabbe apesayi;
anya-e0703n:2315: Te gantvā kalahaṃ katvā, tajjitā tehi āgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2317: Kalahanagaraṃ nāma, gāmo tattha kate ahu;
anya-e0703n:2328: Tattha cattāri vassāni, vasi taṃ tattha mātulā;
anya-e0703n:2335: Tesañca khandhāvāramhi, duve vassāni so vasī.
anya-e0703n:2341: Taṃ sutvā tassa kujjiṃsu, bhātaro nava rājino.
anya-e0703n:2343: Upatthambho tvamevā’si, ciraṃ tassa idāni tu;
anya-e0703n:2344: Raṭṭhaṃ dadāsi tasmā tvaṃ, māressāmā’ti abravuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2346: So tesaṃ rajjamappesi, te tissaṃ nāma bhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2359: Pacchato agataṃ disvā, bhītā tejena tassasā.
anya-e0703n:2362: Dhāvamānā saraṃ haṃ sā, sattakkhattuṃ parikkhipi.
anya-e0703n:2367: Taṃ saraṃ puna tikkhattuṃ, parikkhipi tato puna;
anya-e0703n:2368: Gaṅgaṃ kacchakatitthena, samotari tahiṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n:2371: Tassa puññānubhāvena, so ahosi mahā asi.
anya-e0703n:2374: Rajjaṃ gahetvā te dajjaṃ, sāmi māmaṃ amārayi.
anya-e0703n:2376: Gīvāya taṃ gahetvā so, vijjhitvā asikoṭiyā;
anya-e0703n:2377: Nāsāya rajjuyā bandhi, sā ahosi vasānugā.
anya-e0703n:2379: Gantvā taṃ dhumarakkhaṃ so, tamāruyha mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:2380: Tattha cattāri vassāni, dhūmarakkhana ge vasi.
anya-e0703n:2395: Iti vatvāna pesesi, kumāro purato balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2397: Gaṇhissāmi paviṭṭhanti, vissaṭṭhesu tu tesu so;
anya-e0703n:2404: Ghātetvā mātule ca’ttha, sīsarāsiṃ akaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:2415: Attano rājagehaṃ so, tassa datvāna ayyako;
anya-e0703n:2416: Aññatthavāsaṃ kappesi, so tu tasmiṃ ghare vasi.
anya-e0703n:2434: Aghātayitvā jeṭṭhaṃ taṃ, mātulaṃ abhayaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:2442: Saraṃ tañca khaṇāpetvā, kārāpesi bahū dakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2446: Yakkhaṃ tu cittarājaṃ taṃ, heṭṭho abhayavāpiyā.
anya-e0703n:2454: Dāpesi chaṇakāle tu, cittarājena so saha;
anya-e0703n:2500: Sivikā sotthisālā ca, akāresi tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2554: Ekā kusumā yaṭṭhītu, kusumāni tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:2558: Nānā ca nānāvaṇṇā ca, sajīvā viya dissare.
anya-e0703n:2563: Muttāsamudā uggantvā, tīre vaṭṭi viya ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:2570: Tāni disvā patīto so, rājā iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n:2575: Devānaṃ piyatisso ca, dhammāsoko ca te ime;
anya-e0703n:2579: Dijaṃ amaccaṃ gaṇataṃ, rājā te caturo jane.
anya-e0703n:2582: Gāhā petvā anagghāni, ratanāni imāni so.
anya-e0703n:2584: Maṇijātī ca tisso tā, tisso ca rathayaṭṭhiyo;
anya-e0703n:2585: Saṅkhañca dakkhiṇāvattaṃ, muttā jātī ca aṭṭha tā.
anya-e0703n:2588: Sukhena titthaṃ laddhāna, sattāhena tato puna.
anya-e0703n:2591: Adaṃsu paṇṇākārete, disvā tāni pasīdi so.
anya-e0703n:2599: Tesaṃ anappake bhoge, datvā vāsagharāni ca;
anya-e0703n:2620: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:2633: Oruyha kūpaṃ passiṃsu, patvā dvādasiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2658: Pesesi kattike māse, tete there tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2670: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ there dve, soṇamuttara meva ca.
anya-e0703n:2688: Vātā mahantā vāyanti, megho gajjati vassati.
anya-e0703n:2696: Sabbaṃ taṃ iddhiyā thero, paṭibāhiya bhiṃsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2699: Sadeva kopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0703n:2700: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2702: Sace’pi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n:2714: Paṇḍako nāma yakkho tu, saddhiṃhārita yakkhiyā;
anya-e0703n:2720: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2774: Gantvā catūhi therehi, desesi majjhimo isi;
anya-e0703n:2784: Suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ agamā, tasmiṃ tu samaye pana.
anya-e0703n:2794: Iti cintiya māretuṃ, sā yuvā upasaṅkamuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2797: Samaṇā mayaṃ himavantā, na rakkhasi sahāyakā;
anya-e0703n:2798: Rakkhasī sā saparisā, nikkhantā hoti sāgarā.
anya-e0703n:2804: Idaṃ imehi uddhanti, mantvā bhītā palāyisā.
anya-e0703n:2809: Saraṇesu ca sīlesu, aṭṭhaṃsu bahavo janā;
anya-e0703n:2845: Sampatvā mataraṃ passi, devī disvā piyaṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2851: So asoka kumāro hi, ujjenīgamanā purā.
anya-e0703n:2853: Vedise nagare vāsaṃ, upagantvā tahiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:2856: Saṃvāsaṃ tāya kappesi, gabbhaṃ gaṇhiya tena sā;
anya-e0703n:2857: Ujjeniyaṃ kumāraṃ taṃ, mahindaṃ janayī subhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:2860: Tasmiṃ kāle vasati sā, vedise nagare tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:2862: Thero tattha nisīditvā, kālaññū iti cintayi;
anya-e0703n:2877: Therena deviyā dhammaṃ, sutvā desitameva tu;
anya-e0703n:2883: Saddhiṃ tena gahaṭṭhena, na rato ñātihetunā;
anya-e0703n:2884: Tasmā vihārā ākāsaṃ, uggantvā so mahiddhiko.
anya-e0703n:2908: Rājā disvā ‘‘pamattaṃ taṃ, na yuttaṃ vijjhituṃ’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:2917: Bhīto aṭṭhāsi taṃ thero, ‘‘ehi tissāti abravi;
anya-e0703n:2923: Iccāha thero taṃ sutvā, rājā vītabhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n:2926: Dhanuṃ sarañca nikkhippa, upasaṅkamma taṃ isiṃ;
anya-e0703n:2929: Tadā tassa manussā te, āgamma parivārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:2930: Tadā sese cha dassesi, mahāthero sahāgate.
anya-e0703n:2932: Te disvā abravī rājā, ‘‘kadā’’ me āgatā iti;
anya-e0703n:2933: ‘‘Mayā saddhiṃ’’ti therena, vutte pucchi idaṃ puna.
anya-e0703n:2945: Puṭṭho puṭṭho viyākāsi, taṃtaṃ pañhaṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:2947: Rukkhoyaṃ rājakinnāmo, añño nāma ayaṃ taru;
anya-e0703n:2948: Imaṃ muñciya attha’mbo, santi ambatarū bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:2951: Santi bhante bahu rukkhā, anambāpana te taru.
anya-e0703n:2953: Aññe ambe anambe ca, muñciya’tthi mahīruhā;
anya-e0703n:2956: Santi te ñātakā rāja, santi bhante bahujjanā;
anya-e0703n:2957: Santi aññātakā rāja, santi te ñātito bahū.
anya-e0703n:2959: Ñātake te ca aññe ca, muñciya’ññopi atthi nu;
anya-e0703n:2969: ‘‘Na bhuñjissa’’nti dāni me, iti janammi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:2972: Na bhuñjāma idānī’ti, vutte kālañca pucchiso.
anya-e0703n:2975: Tuvaṃ gaccha mahārāja, vasissāma mayaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:2977: Evaṃ sati kumāro’yaṃ, amhehi saha gacchatu;
anya-e0703n:2981: Idāni pabbajessāma, imaṃ tvaṃ gaccha bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:2983: Pāto rathaṃ pesayissaṃ, tumhe tattha ṭhitā puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:2992: Thero taṃ gāmasīmāyaṃ, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe akā;
anya-e0703n:2996: Sumanaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, thero āmantayī tato.
anya-e0703n:2999: Sāvento kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, bhante ghosema’haṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:3005: Bhuñjanto taṃ ravaṃ sutvā, therantika mapesayi.
anya-e0703n:3013: Tena ghosena devānaṃ, sannipāto mahā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3017: Bahū nāgā supaṇṇā ca, saraṇesu patiṭṭhayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3022: Rājā pabhā te pāhesi, rathaṃ sārathi so gato;
anya-e0703n:3025: Nā’rohāma rathaṃ gaccha, gacchāma tava pacchato;
anya-e0703n:3043: Tadantare sārathi so, there disvā tahiṃ ṭhite;
anya-e0703n:3046: Gantvā rañño nivedesi, sutvā sabbaṃ mahīmati;
anya-e0703n:3058: Narindo pūjayanto te, there antepuraṃ nayi;
anya-e0703n:3071: Desesi thero tā itthī, paṭhamaṃ phalamajjhaguṃ.
anya-e0703n:3077: Sutvā pucchiya jānitvā, āha tesaṃ hitatthiko.
anya-e0703n:3088: Taṃ sutvāna pasīdiṃsu, nagarā te samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:3107: Nikkhamma dakkhiṇadvārā, thero tattha nisīdi ca;
anya-e0703n:3116: Tato therā nikkhamiṃsu, ‘‘yāma taṃ pabbataṃ’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:3131: Taṃ nandanā dakkhiṇena, nayaṃ theraṃ rathesabho;
anya-e0703n:3138: Puraṃ pāvisi therā tu, taṃ rattiṃ tattha te vasuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3141: There upacca vanditvā, pūjetvā kusumehi ca.
anya-e0703n:3143: Pucchi kacci sukhaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ, uyyānaṃ phāsukaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:3144: Sukhaṃ vutthaṃ mahārāja, uyyānaṃ yati phāsukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3146: Ārāmo kappate bhante, saṅghassā’’ti apucchi so;
anya-e0703n:3150: Taṃ sutvā abhihaṭṭho so, tuṭṭhahaṭṭho mahājano.
anya-e0703n:3167: Āgacchatū’ti pesehi, rañño no pitu santikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3168: Pabbājessati sā therī, āgatā itthiyo imā.
anya-e0703n:3174: Mahiyā patite toye, akampittha mahā mahī.
anya-e0703n:3180: Thero rājagharaṃ gantvā, tassa dakkhiṇato ṭhito.
anya-e0703n:3183: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3185: Ahosi tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ, kāle’pi idha mālako;
anya-e0703n:3189: Tattakā neva pupphāni, thero tatthāpi okiri.
anya-e0703n:3191: Tatthā’pi puthuvī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3195: Tattakehe’va pupphehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ pūjayī isi.
anya-e0703n:3198: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchi, thero tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3209: Tathāpi puthavī kampi, puṭṭho tassā’ha kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3210: Saṅghassu posathā gāraṃ, idha hessati bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:3224: Ambaṭṭhikaṃ adā rājā, taṃ sayaṃ tattha ropayi;
anya-e0703n:3227: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva bījamhā, tamhā nikkhamma aṅkuro;
anya-e0703n:3230: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, parisā sā sarājikā;
anya-e0703n:3233: Thero tadā pupphamuṭṭhi, aṭṭha tattha samokiri;
anya-e0703n:3242: Taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ pucchi, rājā thero viyākari;
anya-e0703n:3246: Idha ṭhapetvā bhojesuṃ, sasaṅghe sugate tayo.
anya-e0703n:3257: Thūpārahaṃ thalaṭhānaṃ, ahu there tahiṃ gate;
anya-e0703n:3261: Thero campakapupphehi, tehi pūjesi taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3263: Tatthāpi puthavī kampi, rājā taṃ kampakāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3269: Imamhi kappe paṭhamaṃ, kakusandho jino ahu;
anya-e0703n:3275: Kadamba nadiyā pāre, tattha rājā’bhayo ahu;
anya-e0703n:3281: Taṃ gantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3291: Sabbe maṃ ajja passantu, ojadīpamhi mānusā.
anya-e0703n:3297: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3299: Devatā balidānatthaṃ, manussā ca tahiṃ gatā;
anya-e0703n:3302: Rājā so munirājaṃ taṃ, atihaṭṭho’bhi vādiya;
anya-e0703n:3308: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu vare sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3315: Santappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3317: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3323: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3329: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3332: Ādāya dakkhiṇaṃ sākhaṃ, bodhito me sirīsato;
anya-e0703n:3335: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3336: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3345: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3359: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3365: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n:3368: Ṭhapetvā idha sambuddho, tato pācinato pana.
anya-e0703n:3379: Samiddho nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3380: Nāmena varadīpo’ti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3385: Taṃ hutvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3401: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippamupāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3412: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:3423: Idheva pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3429: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3430: Tadā tiṃsa sahassāni, pattā maggaphalaṃ narā.
anya-e0703n:3435: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3441: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3442: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3451: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3463: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3465: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3469: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ, ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhuniṃ.
anya-e0703n:3477: Imamhi kappe tatiyaṃ, kassapo gottato jino;
anya-e0703n:3483: Jayanto nāma nāmena, tattha rājā tadā ahu;
anya-e0703n:3484: Nāmena maṇḍadīpoti, ayaṃ dīpo tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3486: Tadā jayantarañño ca, rañño kaniṭṭhabhātu ca;
anya-e0703n:3489: Kassapo so dasabalo, tena yuddhena pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3492: Taṃ hantvā sattavinayaṃ, pavattiṃ sāsanassa ca;
anya-e0703n:3505: Rājā ca nāgarā ceva, disvā khippaṃ upāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3511: Rājā ca so kumāro ca, yuddhamujjhiṃsu vimhitā.
anya-e0703n:3519: Kārite maṇḍape ramme, pallaṅkesu varesu taṃ;
anya-e0703n:3526: Sasantappesi sasaṅghaṃ taṃ, rājā so lokanāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3528: Idhe’va pacchābhattaṃ taṃ, nisinnassa jinassa so;
anya-e0703n:3534: Ettheva so nisīditvā, dhammaṃ desesi nāyako;
anya-e0703n:3540: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato;
anya-e0703n:3546: Tassa taṃ cittamaññāya, sā therī tadanantaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3547: Gahetvā tattha rājānaṃ, upasaṅkamma taṃ taruṃ.
anya-e0703n:3556: Ṭhapesi dakkhiṇe hatthe, taṃ gahetvā tathāgato.
anya-e0703n:3568: Nisinno tattha appetvā, samādhiṃ vuṭṭhito tato.
anya-e0703n:3570: Dhammaṃ desesi sambuddho, parisāya tahiṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3574: Datvā saparivāraṃ taṃ; Ṭhapetvā idha bhikkhunī.
anya-e0703n:3582: Ahu imasmiṃ kappasmiṃ, catutthaṃ gotamo jino;
anya-e0703n:3607: Idha aññāni kiccāni, bahūni tava bhūmipa.
anya-e0703n:3609: Tāni kārehi nattāte, kāressati imaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:3613: Rājā goṭṭhābhayo nāma, tassa putto bhavissati.
anya-e0703n:3616: Tassa rañño suto rāja, mahārājā bhavissati.
anya-e0703n:3621: Iccāha thero therassa, vacane ne’ttha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:3630: Rañño ghare bhattakiccaṃ, katvā nikkhamma mandiraṃ;
anya-e0703n:3633: Suttaṃ janassa desetvā, sahassaṃ mānuse tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:3640: Tissārāmaṃ agā thero, rājā ca sutadesano.
anya-e0703n:3651: Tasmā katvā puraṃ anto-sīmaṃ bandhatha sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3660: Catutthe divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n:3666: Pāto bheriṃ carāpetvā, maṇḍayitvā puraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3678: Mahāpadumo kuñjaro ca, ubho nāgā sumaṅgalā;
anya-e0703n:3699: Kenakena nimittena, sīmā ettha gatāti ce;
anya-e0703n:3703: Tato kumbalavāṭaṃ taṃ, mahānipaṃ tato agā.
anya-e0703n:3722: Tato marumbatittaṅgo, tato uddhaṃ nidiṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:3723: Paṭhama cetiya pācine, dve kadambā ajāyisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:3746: Pañcame divase thero, rañño gehamhi bhuñjiya;
anya-e0703n:3795: Therā passaya pariveṇaṃ, etaṃ tena pavuccati.
anya-e0703n:3828: Theraṃ tattha gataṃ sutvā, rathaṃ āruyha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:3829: Deviyo dve ca ādāya, therassānupadaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:3841: Kathesi rañño taṃ sutvā, bhāgineyyo ca rājino.
anya-e0703n:3852: Agamāsi puraṃ rājā, therā tattheva te vasuṃ;
anya-e0703n:3859: Sīmaṃ sīmātigo thero, bandhitvā tadaheva so.
anya-e0703n:3880: Ciradiṭṭho hi sambuddho, satthā no manujādhipa;
anya-e0703n:3881: Anāthavāsaṃ avasimha, natthi no pūjiyaṃ idha.
anya-e0703n:3884: Āha dhātūsu diṭṭhesu, diṭṭho hoti jino’’ iti.
anya-e0703n:3886: Vidito vo adhippāyo, thūpassa kāraṇe mayā;
anya-e0703n:3887: Kāressāmi ahaṃ thūpaṃ, tumhe jānātha dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:3890: Rājā’ha sāmaṇeraṃ taṃ, kuto lacchāma dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:3899: Icchāha sāmaṇero so, sumano taṃ sumānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3904: Ehi tvaṃ bhadra sumana, gantvā pupphapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3905: Ayyakaṃ te mahārājaṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3910: Munino dhātuyo dehi, pattaṃ bhuttañca satthunā;
anya-e0703n:3913: Pattapūrā gahetvā tā, gantvā devapuraṃ varaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3914: Sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ taṃ, evaṃ no vacanaṃ vada.
anya-e0703n:3919: Dāṭhaṃ tvameva pūjehi, akkhakaṃ dehi satthuno;
anya-e0703n:3937: Taṃ dhātuṃ dhātupattañca, ādāya sumano tato;
anya-e0703n:3943: Ṭhapesi dhātuyo sabbā, thero tattheva pabbate;
anya-e0703n:3944: Missakaṃ pabbataṃ tasmā, āhu cetiya pabbataṃ.
anya-e0703n:3949: Sacāyaṃ munino dhātu, chattaṃ namatu me sayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:3952: Sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātu, āgamma saha dhātuko;
anya-e0703n:3953: Iti rājā vicintesi, cintitaṃ taṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:3958: Haṭṭho hattī kuñcanādaṃ, akā kampittha medinī;
anya-e0703n:3962: Dakkhiṇena ca dvārena, nikkhamitvā tato puna.
anya-e0703n:3970: Manussadevo devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ rakkhitaṃ suciṃ;
anya-e0703n:3974: Nāgo na icchitaṃ rājā, theraṃ pucchittha taṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0703n:3977: Dhātuoropanaṃ tena, na iṭṭhamī’ti so bravi.
anya-e0703n:3996: Rattiṃ nāgo’nupariyāti, taṃ ṭhānaṃ so sadhātu kaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4003: Tato tato samanto ca, samāgami mahājano.
anya-e0703n:4036: Akāsi tasmā sā dhātu, tadā taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4041: Patiṭṭhitāya tassā ca, dhātuyā cetiye tadā;
anya-e0703n:4047: Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā, pasīdiṃsu jane janā;
anya-e0703n:4056: Tatho’patissagāmā ca, pañca pañca satāni ca;
anya-e0703n:4059: Evaṃ purā bāhirā ca, sabbe pabbajitā tadā;
anya-e0703n:4065: Rājorodhā khattiyā ca, amaccā nāgarā tathā;
anya-e0703n:4066: Sabbe janapadā ceva, pujā’kaṃsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4093: Sakkhissāmi ahaṃ deva, ānetuṃ taṃ duve tato;
anya-e0703n:4096: Evaṃ hotūti vatvāna, rājā taṃ tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n:4097: So therassa ca rañño ca, sāsanaṃ gayha vandiya.
anya-e0703n:4127: Gantvā pitusamīpaṃ sā, therī theramataṃ bravī.
anya-e0703n:4129: Āha rājā tuvaṃ amma, apassanto kathaṃ ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4132: Āha sā me mahārāja, bhātuno vacanaṃ garu;
anya-e0703n:4133: Pabbājanīyā ca bahū, gantabbaṃ tattha tena me.
anya-e0703n:4136: Kathannu sākhaṃ gaṇissaṃ’’, iti rājā vicintayī.
anya-e0703n:4141: Bhante laṃkaṃ mahābodhi, pesetabbā nu kho iti;
anya-e0703n:4145: Ābhāsi rañño taṃ sutvā, tussitvā dharaṇīpati.
anya-e0703n:4219: Evaṃ satena mūlānaṃ, tattha sā gandhakaddame;
anya-e0703n:4231: Sayaṃ nādehi tūriyānaṃ, devesu mānusesu ca;
anya-e0703n:4243: Rājā oruyha pīṭhamhā, taṃ sattāhaṃ tahiṃ vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4259: Nānāpūjāhi sattāhaṃ, puna tattheva so vasi.
anya-e0703n:4267: Pūjento taṃ dinaṃyeva, upanetvā sakaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:4329: Eva mevā’bhi pūjetu, rājā rajjena me sakhā’’.
anya-e0703n:4331: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, tīre pañjaliko ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:4369: Tasmiṃṭhāne katā sālā, pakā setuṃ tamabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4396: Therassa sutvā kāretvā, saññāṇāni tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4400: Ṭhapāpetvā mahābodhiṃ, ṭhānesu tesu tesu ca.
anya-e0703n:4421: Uggantvāna ṭhitā muñci, chabbaṇṇā rasmiyo subhā.
anya-e0703n:4444: Sattāhā tikkame meghā, sabbe apagamiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:4445: Mahābodhi ca dissittha, chabbaṇṇā raṃsiyopi ca.
anya-e0703n:4451: Tivakka brāhmaṇo ceva, dīpavāsī janāpi ca.
anya-e0703n:4469: Mahābodhi ṭhita ṭhāne, nāvāyo rohane tadā.
anya-e0703n:4493: Sasaṅghā saṅghamittā sā, mahātherī tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n:4499: Ekasmiṃ piya mekasmiṃ, arittaṃ tehi teviduṃ.
anya-e0703n:4508: Hatthiṃ tattharataṃ ñatvā, akaṃsu tattha āḷhakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4510: Atheka divasaṃ hatthī, nagaṇhi kabaḷāni so;
anya-e0703n:4511: Dīpappasādakaṃ theraṃ, rājā so pucchitaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e0703n:4516: Sadhātukaṃ tattha thūpaṃ, thūpassa gharameva ca;
anya-e0703n:4529: Gantvā tattha gataṃ sutvā, gantvāna tattha vandiya.
anya-e0703n:4532: Tassā ñatvā adhippāyaṃ, adhippāya vidū vidū.
anya-e0703n:4556: Tato dvādasame vasse, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4562: Tato tu tatiye vasse, sābālā rūpamāninī;
anya-e0703n:4563: ‘‘Mayāpi ca ayaṃ rājā, mahābodhiṃ ma māyati’’.
anya-e0703n:4568: Tato ca tutthevassamhi, dhammā soko mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n:4571: Devānaṃ piyatisso tu, rājā dhammaguṇe rato;
anya-e0703n:4583: Hatthikkhandhe ṭhapetvā tā, dhātuyo idha āhara;
anya-e0703n:4584: Iti vutto satherena, tathā āhari dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:4598: Yā yā mahāmahindena, therena vasitā guhā;
anya-e0703n:4634: Ayaṃ dīpo ahu ṭhito, vijite tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4637: Tassa’cca ye taṃ kaniṭṭho, uttiyo iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n:4638: Rājaputto aputtaṃ taṃ, rajjaṃ kāresi sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4644: Laṃkāyaso satthu kappo, katvā laṃkāhitaṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4653: Tena taṃ divasaṃ nāma, aṭṭhamiyāti sammataṃ.]
anya-e0703n:4656: Gantvāna theraṃ vanditvā kanditvā bahudhā bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:4683: Karonto tattha netvā taṃ, kūṭāgāraṃ manoramaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4689: Sabbesu ca vihāresu, thūpe kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4706: Sabbā alaṅkatā laṃkā, therassa viya āsi ca;
anya-e0703n:4713: Thūpañca tattha kāresi, uttiyo so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:4724: Dasavassāni so rājā, rajjaṃ kāresi uttiyo;
anya-e0703n:4727: Taṃ etaṃ atisāhasaṃ atibalaṃ na vāriyaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n:4729: Nibbindo viratiṃ ratiṃ na kurute pāpehi puññehi ca;
anya-e0703n:4738: Dasa vassāni kāresi, rajjaṃ sujana sevako.
anya-e0703n:4746: Dakkhiṇāya disāyaṃ so, vihāraṃ nagaraṃ gaṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4758: Pure rajjā ca rajje ca, saṭṭhīvassāni sādhukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4768: Te gahetvā aselo tu, muṭasivassa atrajo.
anya-e0703n:4782: Eko putto ca dhītā ca, ahesuṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:4789: Rājā teneva cakkena, sīsaṃ puttassa chedayi.
anya-e0703n:4794: Āṇāpetvāna taṃ rājā, kucchiṃ tassa vidāḷiya;
anya-e0703n:4812: Thūpaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, khamāpehī’’ti āhu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:4814: Te ṭhapetuṃ pañcadasa, pāsāṇe patite tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4817: Akā mahallikā vīhiṃ, so setuṃ ātape khipi;
anya-e0703n:4818: Devo akāle vassitvā, tassā vihiṃ atemayi.
anya-e0703n:4820: Vīhiṃ gahetvā gantvā sā, ghaṇṭaṃ taṃ samaghaṭṭayi;
anya-e0703n:4833: Tatoppabhuti taṃ rajje, divā devo na vassatha.
anya-e0703n:4867: Puttaṃ janesi so tassa, bhātu nāma makārayi.
anya-e0703n:4877: Yaṭṭhālaya katisso so, tassa putto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n:4878: Hattheva rajjaṃ kāresi, tassa putto’bhayo tathā.
anya-e0703n:4881: Tadaccaye tattha rajjaṃ, so akāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:4886: Kalyāṇiyaṃ narindo hi, tisso nāmāsi khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:4890: Aññattha vasi so deso, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:4893: Pāhesi deviyā gantvā, rājadvāre ṭhito tuso.
anya-e0703n:4898: Therena saddhiṃ bhuñjitvā, rañño saha viniggame;
anya-e0703n:4904: Theraṃ taṃ purisaṃ tañca, mārāpetvāna kodhasā;
anya-e0703n:4908: Attano dhītaraṃ yuddhaṃ, deviṃ nāma surupiniṃ.
anya-e0703n:4920: Upaṭṭhahi tadā saṅghaṃ, paccayehi catūhi so.
anya-e0703n:4926: Ṭhapesi tīṇi pāsāṇe, pāsāṇa phalakāni so.
anya-e0703n:4928: Adā pānīya dānañca, vattaṃ saṅghassa cā’kari;
anya-e0703n:4940: Tadā tatheva katvā sā, saṅghattherassa santike;
anya-e0703n:4941: Nisīdi dhammaṃ desento, thero taṃ idha mabravi.
anya-e0703n:4946: Evaṃ vutte tu sā āha, ‘‘kiṃ sampatti ayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:4947: Yesaṃ no dārakā natthi, vañjhāsampatti tena no’’.
anya-e0703n:4953: ‘‘Patthehi mama puttattaṃ, sampattī mahatī hi no’’.
anya-e0703n:4955: Na icchatīti ñatvāna, tadatthaṃ mahatiṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:4959: Nānā bhesajja vatthāni, saṅghe datvā’tha yācitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:4961: Patthesi so rājakulaṃ, sā taṃ ṭhānaṃ anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:4965: Tassā kucchimhi nibbatti, taṃ jāniya nivattisā.
anya-e0703n:4967: Rañño taṃ sāsanaṃ datvā, raññā saha punā’gamā;
anya-e0703n:4973: Tasse’vaṃ dohaḷo āhi, mahā puññāya mātuyā;
anya-e0703n:4986: Taṃ devī rājino āha, nemitte pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:4991: Edisaṃ madhugaṇḍaṃ so, dasseti tassa īdisiṃ;
anya-e0703n:4995: Nāvaṃ ñatvāna ācikkhi, rañño janapade naro.
anya-e0703n:4997: Rājā deviṃ tahiṃ netvā, maṇḍapamhi susaṅkhate;
anya-e0703n:5001: Veḷusumana nāmaṃ taṃ, yodhaṃ tattha niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:5004: Gopakena akā mettiṃ, tassa kiccañca sabbadā.
anya-e0703n:5006: Tassa vissattha taṃ ñatvā, pātova uppalāna’siṃ;
anya-e0703n:5012: Sutvā rājā gahetuṃ taṃ, mahā yodhānapesayi;
anya-e0703n:5021: Dohaḷe te ca sā devī, paribhuñji yathāruci;
anya-e0703n:5024: Sā devī samaye dhaññaṃ, janayī puttamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5025: Mahārājakule tasmiṃ, ānando ca mahā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5037: Kaṇḍulo iti ñāyittha, diṭṭhattā kaṇḍulena so.
anya-e0703n:5049: Sabbe te uddhapattañca, cīvaraṃ pārapantu ca.
anya-e0703n:5051: Paṭhamaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ pādaṃ, ummāranto ṭhapentu ca;
anya-e0703n:5054: Gotamo nāma thero ca, patiggaṇhātu puttakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5055: So ca saraṇasikkhā yo, detu’’ sabbaṃ tathā ahu.
anya-e0703n:5058: Datvā saṅghassa pāyāsaṃ, nāmaṃ puttassa kārayi.
anya-e0703n:5064: Saṅgamaṃ deviyā kāsi, tena gabbhamagaṇhi sā.
anya-e0703n:5066: Kāle jātaṃ sutaṃ rājā, tissanāmaṃ akārayi;
anya-e0703n:5076: Mā jīratu kucchigataṃ, idaṃ vo’’ti apāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5088: Na hessāmā’’ti cintetvā, bhāgaṃ bhuñjathi’manti ca.
anya-e0703n:5093: Amataṃ viya bhuñjiṃsu, te dve bhāge ubhopi ca;
anya-e0703n:5096: Evaṃ vuttetu tisso so, pāṇinā khipi bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5102: Pasāritaṅgo sayane, kiṃ nasesi sukhaṃ suta;
anya-e0703n:5142: Ummārātikkame nandi, sā chajjati yato tato.
anya-e0703n:5153: Damiḷānaṃ khayaṃ disvā, rañño ārocayiṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5163: Iti gantvā gāmaṇissa, taṃ kumārassa sāvayi.
anya-e0703n:5165: Mātuyā mantayitvā so, sakkāraṃ tassa kārayi;
anya-e0703n:5166: Sakkato nandimitto so, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5171: Ahu dīghābhayo nāma, rañño’ñña bhariyā suto;
anya-e0703n:5184: Rocayuṃ tassa gamanaṃ, na tu mātā pitā pana.
anya-e0703n:5189: So taṃ vimaṃsanatthāya, dūre kicce niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5192: Brāhmaṇo kuṇḍalo nāma, vijja te me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n:5195: Gantvā taṃ tena dinnāni, bhaṇḍakāni idhā’hara;
anya-e0703n:5196: Iti vatvāna bhojetvā, lekhaṃ datvā vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5199: Pubbaṇheyeva gantvāna, so taṃ brāhmaṇa maddasa.
anya-e0703n:5210: Upāgami brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ, puṭṭho tenā’ha so gatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5214: Sace jāneyya eḷāro, imaṃ hatthe karissati.
anya-e0703n:5219: Eva mevaṃ likhitvāna, lekhaṃ tassa samappayi;
anya-e0703n:5222: Datvā taṃ bhojayitvā ca, pesesī sakhisantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5241: So sabbaṃ ekato katvā, netvā mātāpitantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5245: Pabhāte rājaputto taṃ, sutvā tuṭṭhamano ahu.
anya-e0703n:5270: Tena so laddhasakkāro, yodho vasi tadantike.
anya-e0703n:5276: Karonti keḷiparihāsaṃ, tassa jeṭṭhā cha bhātaro.
anya-e0703n:5279: Tassa bhāgaṃ ṭhapetvāna, gantvā tassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5281: So gantvā taṃ khaṇaṃyeva, rukkhe imbarasaññite;
anya-e0703n:5282: Luñcitvāna samaṃ katvā, bhūmiṃ gantvā nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5284: Gantvāna bhātaro tassa, disvā kammanta mabbhutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5297: Kīḷamāno khipi tadā, so kīḷāguḷake viya.
anya-e0703n:5339: Gantvā ubho sakaṃ nāmaṃ, dārakassa akārayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:5340: Taṃ vuddhaṃ attano gehe, vāsesi siribhojako.
anya-e0703n:5342: Tasse’ko sindhavo posaṃ, kañcinā rohituṃ adā;
anya-e0703n:5343: Disvā tu veḷusumanaṃ, ayaṃ arohako mama.
anya-e0703n:5350: So assaṃ āruhitvā taṃ, sīghaṃ dhāvayi maṇḍale;
anya-e0703n:5351: Maṇḍale sakale asso, ekābaddho adissi so.
anya-e0703n:5356: Taṃ disvā parisā sabbā, ukkuṭṭhiṃ sampavattayi;
anya-e0703n:5366: Īsakaṃ pana khañjattā, khañjadevoti taṃ viduṃ.
anya-e0703n:5368: Migamaṃ gāmavāsīhi, saha gantvāna so tadā;
anya-e0703n:5372: Asumha bhūmiṃ cuṇṇeti, tesaṃ aṭṭhīni māṇavo.
anya-e0703n:5380: Gantvā saha kumārehi, vihāraṃ so kumārako;
anya-e0703n:5384: Ummattā viya āsuṃ te, bhītā sabbepi dārakā.
anya-e0703n:5386: Tena so āsi ummāda-phussa devoti pākaṭo;
anya-e0703n:5389: Saddavedhi vijjuvedhī, vālavedhī ca so ahu;
anya-e0703n:5396: Thale aṭṭhusabhaṃ yāti, jale tu usabhaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:5411: Vahanto paṃsupiṇḍe so, lahuṃ vāpiṃ samāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5413: Tena so pākaṭo āsi, tampi ādāya bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n:5414: Datvā taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ, gāmaṇissa adāsi taṃ.
anya-e0703n:5431: Tathā tepā’nayuṃ yodhe, sabbe sampiṇḍitā tu te;
anya-e0703n:5459: Pitā me puriso honto, ne’vaṃ vakkhati teni’daṃ;
anya-e0703n:5463: Tāya taṃ bandhayissāmi, nā’ññathā rakkhiyo hi so.
anya-e0703n:5475: Sabbe yodhe samānetvā, kāresi sapathaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:5478: Akaṃsu sapathaṃ sabbe, taṃ yuddhaṃ tena nāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5484: Netvā tissa mahārāmaṃ, taṃ saṅghassa nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:5508: Taṃ disvā ‘‘bhikkhusaṅghassa, kammaṃ’’ iti nivatti so.
anya-e0703n:5521: Thero piyaṅgu dīpaṭṭho, theraṃ tattha niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:5525: Saṅghassa bhāgaṃ sambhāgaṃ, rājā patte khipāpayi.
anya-e0703n:5527: Sambhāgaṃ khipi tisso ca, sambhāgaṃ vaḷavāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:5531: Adā gotamatherassa, so gantvā nabhasā lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5534: Pañcasatānaṃ so thero, laddhehi tu tadantikā.
anya-e0703n:5536: Bhāgehi pattaṃ pūretvā, ākāse khipi rājino;
anya-e0703n:5537: Disvā’ gataṃ gahetvā taṃ, tisso bhojisi bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:5540: Sattāhaṃ cumbaṭaṃ katvā, rājā pattaṃ visajjayi.
anya-e0703n:5542: Gantvāna so mahāgāmaṃ, samādāya balaṃ puna;
anya-e0703n:5546: Dve bhātaro samāgañchuṃ, yujjhamānā raṇe tadā.
anya-e0703n:5549: Tathāpi chiddaṃ no disvā, laṅghā petuṃ matiṃakā.
anya-e0703n:5552: Tomaraṃ khipi cammaṃva, yathā chijjati piṭṭhiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5555: Patiṃsu yuddhe yujjhantā, bhijja ceva mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5569: ‘‘Mañce tattha mahārāja’’, iti thero avoca taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5570: Heṭṭhā mañceti jānitvā, tato nikkhamma bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5572: Samantato vihārassa, rakkhaṃ kārayi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5578: Nīyamānantu taṃ ñatvā, idha māha mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:5590: Nikkhāmito so bhikkhūhi, tissorāja suto pana;
anya-e0703n:5613: Janakkhayaṃ vināyeva, kalaho na bhaveyya no;
anya-e0703n:5614: Rājā saṅghassa doseso, bhaṃghe daṇḍaṃ karissati.
anya-e0703n:5644: Maṅgalañceva rakkhā ca, bhikkhūnaṃ dassanaṃ hino.
anya-e0703n:5659: Yujjhaṃ catūhi mā sehi, katahatthaṃ mahabbalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5677: Gaṇhi khāṇuṃ khāṇugāme, dve tu tambuṇṇame pana.
anya-e0703n:5680: Jambucaggahī soso ca, gāmo’hu taṃ tadavhayo.
anya-e0703n:5703: Hatthinā nandimitto tu, yasmā yattha ayujjhi so;
anya-e0703n:5704: Tasmā tattha tato gāmo, hatthiporoti vuccati.
anya-e0703n:5706: Vīmaṃsitvā ubho rājā, vijitaṃ nagaraṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:5712: Dvāraṃ thakesuṃ damiḷā, rājā yodhe visajjayi;
anya-e0703n:5713: Kaṇṇulo nandimitto ca, suranimilo ca dakkhiṇe.
anya-e0703n:5732: Na idaṃ surāpāṇaṃ te, ayodvāra vighāṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5735: So mānaṃ janayitvāna, koñcaṃ katvā gajuttamo;
anya-e0703n:5739: Rājā āruyha hatthiṃ taṃ, kumbhe phusiyapāṇinā.
anya-e0703n:5751: Saddhārabāhaṃ taṃ dvāraṃ, bhūmiyaṃ saravaṃ pati.
anya-e0703n:5766: Oloki suranimalaṃ, anicchaṃ sopi taṃ pathaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5777: Visuṃ visuṃ vīthigatā, damiḷe tattha cuṇṇayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5780: Tatho girilakaṃ gantvā, giriyaṃ damiḷaṃ hani.
anya-e0703n:5803: ‘‘Suve yuddhaṃ karissāmi’’, iti te nicchayaṃ karuṃ.
anya-e0703n:5809: Abbhantare koṭṭhake tu, sayaṃ aṭṭhāsi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:5829: ‘‘Chindā metaṃ saphalakaṃ’’, iti cintiya so pana;
anya-e0703n:5830: Phalakaṃ hani khaggena, taṃ muñciyi’ tarosayi.
anya-e0703n:5835: Saṅkhaṃ dhami phussadevo, senā bhijjittha dāmiḷi;
anya-e0703n:5838: Tattha vāpi jalaṃ āsi, hatānaṃ lohitā vilaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5839: Tasmā kulatthavā pīti, nāmato vissutaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:5850: Vijjhāpesi ca dantehi, taṃ hatthiṃ sakahatthinā;
anya-e0703n:5851: Tomaraṃ khipi eḷāraṃ, sahatthi tattha so pati.
anya-e0703n:5854: Laṃkaṃ ekātapattaṃ so, katvāna pāvisi puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:5856: Puramhi bheriṃ cāretvā, samantā yojane jane;
anya-e0703n:5868: Vijite nagare bhinne, yodho so dīghajattuko;
anya-e0703n:5877: Otiṇṇo so suṇitvāpi, patanaṃ tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:5884: Hatthassa rathayo dhehi, pantīhi ca anunako.
anya-e0703n:5889: Pavatte tumūle yuddhe, sannaddho bhalluko tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:5893: Senāpi saddhiṃ teneva, paccosakki saniṃ saniṃ.
anya-e0703n:5896: Na paccosakki kiṃ etaṃ, phussadevā’’ti āha so.
anya-e0703n:5898: Jayo no paramo deva, jayabhūmi mayaṃ gajo;
anya-e0703n:5907: Mukhaṃ pidhāya khaggena, rājā akkosi taṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:5908: ‘‘Rañño mukhamhi pātemi’’, iti kaṇḍañca so khipi.
anya-e0703n:5910: Āhacca so khaggatalaṃ, kaṇḍo papati bhūmiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:5913: Rañño pacchā nisinno bho, phussadevo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:5916: Rājānaṃ pādato katvā, patamānassa tassa tu;
anya-e0703n:5917: Khipitvā aparaṃ kaṇḍaṃ, vijjhitvā tassa jaṇḍukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5923: Kaṇḍavalliṃ sakaṃ chetvā, pasataṃ lohitaṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:5925: Radhaññā dassesi taṃ disvā, rājā taṃ pucchi‘‘kiṃ’’iti;
anya-e0703n:5926: Rāja daṇḍo kato meti, so avoca mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:5933: Iti vatvā mahārājā, kataññu idha māha ca;
anya-e0703n:5936: Ghātetvā damiḷe sabbe, rājā laddhajayo kato;
anya-e0703n:5952: Kataṃ akkhobhiṇighātaṃ, saranto na sukhaṃ labhi.
anya-e0703n:5957: Āgamma te majjhāyāme, rāja dvāramhi otaruṃ;
anya-e0703n:5964: Tamassā sayituṃ amhe, iti rājā punā’hate.
anya-e0703n:5966: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu bhante assāso, mama hessati yena me;
anya-e0703n:5979: Vanditvā te visajjetvā, sayito puna cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5984: Adatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhuttaṃ atthi nukho iti;
anya-e0703n:5988: Tadatthaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ me, kattabbanti ca cintayi.
anya-e0703n:5990: Ete tenekakoṭi idha manujagaṇe ghātite cintayitvā,
anya-e0703n:5991: Kāmānaṃ hetu etaṃ manasi ca kayirā sādhu ādīnavaṃ taṃ;
anya-e0703n:5992: Sabbesaṃ ghātaniṃ taṃ manasi ca kayirā’ niccataṃ sādhu sādhu,
anya-e0703n:5993: Evaṃ dukkhā pamokkhaṃ subhagati mahavā pāpuṇeyyā’cīrenāti.
anya-e0703n:6009: Icceva māha taṃ rājā, punappunaṃ nisedhayi;
anya-e0703n:6016: Rājā katā bhisekova, mahatā vibhavena so.
anya-e0703n:6030: Cāletuṃ taṃ na sakkhiṃsu, kuntaṃ rājādhikārikā;
anya-e0703n:6033: Rājā mahantaṃ accheraṃ, disvā taṃ haṭṭhamānaso;
anya-e0703n:6034: Vidhāya tattha ārakkhaṃ, pavisitvā puraṃ tato.
anya-e0703n:6039: Tīhi vassehi niṭhāsi, vihāro so narissaro;
anya-e0703n:6051: Patiggaṇhātu taṃ saṅgho, iti so dakkhiṇodakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6054: Vihāre taṃ samantāpi, mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6066: Ante sahassagghanako, sabba saṅgho ca taṃlabhi.
anya-e0703n:6068: Yuddhe dāne ca sūrena, sūrinā ratanattaye;
anya-e0703n:6087: Tato rājā vicintesi, vissutaṃ sussutaṃ sutaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6114: Dibbaṃ vimānaṃ pesetvā, tadā lekhaṃ adātha me’’;
anya-e0703n:6120: Bharaṇiṃ nāma dāsiṃ so, ‘‘niccaṃ dehī’’ti abravi;
anya-e0703n:6121: Datvā sā tāni sakkaccaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ tato cutā.
anya-e0703n:6138: Tāvatiṃsañca gacchantā, disvā theraṃ tameva te;
anya-e0703n:6139: Hiṅgulena tadā lekhaṃ, lekhayitvā paṭe tato.
anya-e0703n:6142: Saṅgho paṭaṃ gahetvā taṃ, pāhesi rājasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6144: Taṃ disvā sumano rājā, āgammārāma muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6168: Sahassaṃ tattha pāsādo, gabbhā āsuṃ susaṅkhatā;
anya-e0703n:6184: Sajjhumaye candimā ca, tārā ca muttakā mayā.
anya-e0703n:6204: Ācāma kumbhisovaṇṇā, uluṅko ca ahu tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6205: Pāsāda paribhogesu, sesesu ca kathā’ vakā.
anya-e0703n:6224: Arahanto ca aṭṭhaṃsu, uddhaṃ catūsu bhūmisu.
anya-e0703n:6249: Āruyha rattiṃ bhuñjitvā, sayito iti cintayi.
anya-e0703n:6252: Na sakkā balimuddhattuṃ, taṃ vajjiya baliṃ ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6258: Devesu ñatvā taṃ sakko, vissakammāna mabravi.
anya-e0703n:6261: Gantvā purā yojanamhi, gambhīra nadī yantike.
anya-e0703n:6263: Māpehi iṭṭhikā tattaṃ’, iti sakke na bhāsito;
anya-e0703n:6266: Pabhāte luddako tattha, sunakhehi vanaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:6270: Antarahitāya godhāya, iti cidhantasi so tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6275: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, piyaṃ janahi tappiyo;
anya-e0703n:6284: Suvaṇṇa puṇṇaṃ taṃ bhūmiṃ, disvā saṅgāmavāsikā;
anya-e0703n:6285: Suvaṇṇa pāhiṃ ādāya, gantvā rañño nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6302: Nagare vāṇijo eko, ādāya sakaṭe bahū;
anya-e0703n:6308: Cāṭippamāṇa taṃ tattha, pakkabhārena nāmi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:6309: Disvā pana salaṭṭhiñca, pāsāṇaṭṭhañca taṃ phalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6311: Vaṇṭe taṃ vāsiyā chetvā, dassāma’gganti cintiya;
anya-e0703n:6317: Muñjitvā’vāṭa puṇṇaṃ taṃ, yūsaṃ pattehī ādiya;
anya-e0703n:6325: Tesaṃ patte gahetvā so, pattāmiñjahi pūriya;
anya-e0703n:6326: Adāsi tesaṃ pakkāmuṃ, tayo eko napakkami.
anya-e0703n:6328: Rajataṃ tassa dassetuṃ, orohitvā tato hi so;
anya-e0703n:6334: Añjasā iminā tvampi, gaccha dānī upāsaka;
anya-e0703n:6335: Gantvāna theraṃ passitvā, veyyāvacca mahāsi ca.
anya-e0703n:6337: Thero ca leṇadvārena, tassa magga amāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6338: Theraṃ vandiya so tena, gacchanto leṇamaddasa.
anya-e0703n:6340: Leṇa dvāramhi ṭhatvāna, passitvā rajatampi so;
anya-e0703n:6353: Kevaṭṭā tā samekkhitvā, rāsiṃ katvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n:6358: Purato uttare passe, satta yojana matthake;
anya-e0703n:6364: Te disvā sunakho luddo, agantvā rājasantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6371: Ete vā rakkhake katvā, sabbāni āharāpayi.
anya-e0703n:6396: Mattikā sukhumā tattha, samantā tiṃ sayojane.
anya-e0703n:6426: Patiṭṭhāpessaṃ sve ettha, sabbo saṅgho sametuno.
anya-e0703n:6432: Cetiya ṭhāna bhūsāya, amacce ca niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:6441: Nahāpite nahāpake ca, appake ca bahūtathā.
anya-e0703n:6443: Vatthāni gandhamālā ca, annāni madhurāni ca;
anya-e0703n:6470: Thero’ sīti sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā;
anya-e0703n:6494: Cattārīsata sahassāni, sahassāni ca saṭṭhi ca;
anya-e0703n:6498: Thero tiṃsa sahassāni, bhikkhū ādāya āgamā.
anya-e0703n:6519: Majjhe ṭhapetvā okāsaṃ, rañño aṭṭhaṃsu bhikkhavo.
anya-e0703n:6521: Pavisitvā tahiṃ rājā, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ tathā ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:6543: Iti so nāgataṃ passaṃ, mahantattaṃ nivārayi.
anya-e0703n:6555: Aṭṭhuttare aṭṭhuttare, vatthānaṃ tu sate pana.
anya-e0703n:6573: Vanditvā pūjayitvā ca, suppatito kamena so.
anya-e0703n:6603: Saṅgho taṃ nādhivāsesi, anupubbena so pana;
anya-e0703n:6610: Satthāhaṃ tattha saṅghassa, tato saṅghaṃ vissajjayi.
anya-e0703n:6612: Tato bheriṃ carāpetvā, iṭṭhakā vaḍḍhakī lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6615: Kathaṃ karissasi ne’ko, pucchito āha bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:6619: Tato upaḍḍhupaḍḍhañca, paṃsū dve ammaṇāni ca.
anya-e0703n:6621: Āhaṃsu rājā paṭibāhi, caturo tepi vaḍḍhakī;
anya-e0703n:6622: Atheko paṇḍito byatto, vaḍḍhakī āha bhūpatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6630: ‘‘Kaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ cetiyaṃ taṃ, karissasi tuvaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:6643: Iti rājā vicintesi, rattiṃñatvāna taṃ marū.
anya-e0703n:6667: Kamena rājā sutvāna, āgato pucchi vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6670: Ekena mattikāpiṇḍaṃ, denti mayhaṃ ahaṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:6672: Ayaṃ āgantuko bhikkhu, ayaṃ nevāsiko iti;
anya-e0703n:6676: So balatassa dassesi, so taṃ rañño nivedayi.
anya-e0703n:6682: Balattho taṃ nivedesi, tadā taṃ jāni so yati.
anya-e0703n:6691: So taṃ tattha niyojesi, kolāhalamahosi ca.
anya-e0703n:6693: Rājā sutvāva’ taṃ āha, ‘‘ñātuṃ sakkā tamiṭṭhikaṃ’’;
anya-e0703n:6694: Jānantopi na sakkāti, rājānaṃ āha vaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:6707: Rañño sabbaṃ nivedesi, rājā tassa adāpayi;
anya-e0703n:6713: Therena saha gantvā so, dissante piyagallake;
anya-e0703n:6719: Kulūpagassa therassa, gahitā me ime mayā;
anya-e0703n:6720: Vatthayugaṃtu puttassa, sabbe tāni dadāmi vo.
anya-e0703n:6722: Iti vatvāna datvā te, gahetvā gacchato pana;
anya-e0703n:6731: Ettheva bhatiyā kammaṃ, karitvā itthiyo duve;
anya-e0703n:6751: Mahāthūpe kataṃ kammaṃ, tassa āhaṃsu devatā;
anya-e0703n:6752: Evaṃ tathāgate heva, pasādo hi mahapphalo.
anya-e0703n:6757: Nava vāre citaṃ sabbaṃ, evaṃ osīdayiṃsu te;
anya-e0703n:6766: Kataṃ etaṃ mahārāja, na idāni karissate;
anya-e0703n:6775: Āharathā’’ti yojesi, te gantvā uttaraṃ kuruṃ;
anya-e0703n:6790: Aṭṭhārasa rataniko, khandho sākhāssa pañca ca;
anya-e0703n:6796: Atha maṅgalikā tassa, khandhe pupphalatāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:6800: Suvaṇṇa ghaṇṭāpantīdha, dāmāni ca tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6860: Dahanaṃ agginibbānaṃ, tattha sakkāra meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6868: Catuddisaṃ te cattāro, mahārājā ṭhitā ahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:6869: Tettiṃsadeva puttā ca, bāttiṃsa ca kumāriyo.
anya-e0703n:6877: Padumādigāhakā devā, aññe devā ca nekadhā;
anya-e0703n:6878: Ratanagghiya panti ca, dhammacakkāna meva ca.
anya-e0703n:6902: Dhātu tassa vicuṇṇitaṃ janahitaṃ āsiṃsatā pūjiya;
anya-e0703n:6904: Tiṭṭhantaṃ sugataṃ viya’ssa munino dhātu ca sambūjaye.
anya-e0703n:6914: Dhātugabbhamhi kammāni, mayā niṭṭhāpi tāni hi;
anya-e0703n:6915: Suve dhātuṃ nidhessāmi, bhante jānātha dhātuyo’’.
anya-e0703n:6917: Idaṃ vatvā mahārājā, nagaraṃ pāvisī tato;
anya-e0703n:6935: Taṃ pāpuṇitvā gaṅgāya, jalaṃ pakkhili taṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:6936: Bhikkhū asaddahantā taṃ, satthuno taṃ nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:6944: Idhā’netvā dassayitvā, janassa puna taṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6948: Ussāpetvāna dassetvā, janassa khipi taṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:6953: Iti patthayi tenetaṃ, saṅgho soṇuttaraṃ yatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6957: Kathesi saṅgho therassa, tassa tā dhātuyo iti.
anya-e0703n:6963: Ekaṃ doṇaṃ rāmagāme, koḷiyehi ca sakkataṃ.
anya-e0703n:6965: Nāgalokaṃ tato nitaṃ, tato nāgehi sakkataṃ;
anya-e0703n:6986: Samuddaṃ pavisitvāna, dvidhā bhinne jale tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:6989: Nāgā disvā karaṇḍaṃ taṃ, kāḷanāgassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:6993: Dhātū tā abhipūjento, netvāna bhavanaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:6996: Māpetvā saha nāgehi, sadā pūjesi sādaro.
anya-e0703n:7001: Iccevaṃ saṅghavacanaṃ, sutvā sādhūti so pana;
anya-e0703n:7005: Cāresi nagare bheriṃ, sabba kiccaṃ vidhāya taṃ.
anya-e0703n:7020: Mahatā ca baloghena, hatthivā jirathehi ca.
anya-e0703n:7023: Āruyha surathaṃ aṭṭhā, suseta ca susindhavaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7053: Patvā’dhikāraṃ sabbaṃ so, saṅgha sandesa mabruvi.
anya-e0703n:7056: Tava hatthagatā dhātu, dehitā kira me tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7058: Taṃ sutvā nāgarājāso, atīva domanassi to;
anya-e0703n:7076: Bahū devā ca nāgā ca, osariṃsu tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:7080: Ñatvā’naha theraṃ taṃ, dhātunatthi me santike iti.
anya-e0703n:7085: Aññathā saññāpetuṃ taṃ, theraṃ so uragādhipo;
anya-e0703n:7086: Ādāya cetiya gharaṃ, gantvā taṃ tassa vaṇṇayi.
anya-e0703n:7095: Dhātūnaṃ nayanaṃ nāma, nayuttaṃ bhikkhuvo idaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7103: Dhātunidhānaṃ ajje’va, so hi rājā karissati;
anya-e0703n:7104: Tasmā papañcamakaritvā, lahuṃ me dehi dhātuyo’’.
anya-e0703n:7107: Gahetvā yāhi taṃ thero, tikkhattuṃ taṃ bhaṇāpiya.
anya-e0703n:7124: Bhikkhu nāgassa vijaye, tuṭṭhā devā samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:7131: Te tena tuṭṭhā gantvāna, pūjā bhaṇḍāni āharuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7134: Ādāya saha devehi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ samupāgato.
anya-e0703n:7166: Mātūnaṃ purato ceva, tattha tattha ca pañcasu;
anya-e0703n:7173: Dhātuṃ pūjīya vanditvā, ṭhito pañcalīko tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:7202: Sayaṃ karaṇḍo vivari, uggantvā dhātuyo tato;
anya-e0703n:7214: Tato oruyha caṅkoṭo, rañño sīse patiṭṭhahi;
anya-e0703n:7227: Janassa saraṇaṃ hutvā, yadi ṭhassanti dhātuyo.
anya-e0703n:7232: Iti cintiya so dhātū, ṭhapesi sayanuttame;
anya-e0703n:7233: Tadā kārā dhātuyo ca, sahiṃsu sayanuttame.
anya-e0703n:7242: Laṃkāya rajjaṃ sakalaṃ, sattāhāni adāsi ca.
anya-e0703n:7257: Yathā sakaṃ gharaṃ yantu’’, taṃ yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:7265: Saṅgho te dve sāmaṇere, tasmiṃ kamme niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:7269: Mā nibbāyantu dīpāva, mā kiñcāpi vivajjatu.
anya-e0703n:7327: Yo so na paccudāvatto, mahāyodho vasī mama.
anya-e0703n:7330: Idāni so maṃ no peti, thero theraputtabhayo.
anya-e0703n:7332: Iti cintayi sothero, jānitvā tassa cintitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7338: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, purato ca nisīdiya;
anya-e0703n:7342: Maccusattuṃ parājetuṃ, na sakkomī’’ti āha ca.
anya-e0703n:7354: Upaṭṭhite devaloke, hitvā dibbaṃ sukhaṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7356: Idhāgamma bahuṃ puññaṃ, akāsi ca anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:7365: Tadā ca āharāpetvā, pahaṭṭho puñña potthakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7366: Vācetuṃ lekhakaṃ āha, so taṃ vācesi potthakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7412: Ghate pakke mahājāla, pūve ṭhānamhi tattake;
anya-e0703n:7413: Tatheva saha bhattehi, nicca emava adāpayiṃ.
anya-e0703n:7415: Uposathesu divasesu, māse māse ca aṭṭhasu;
anya-e0703n:7434: Dinna dāna dvayaṃyeva, taṃ me hāsesi mānasaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7436: Taṃ sutvā abhayo thero, taṃ dānadvayameva so;
anya-e0703n:7442: Navannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ, datvā taṃ paribhuñji so;
anya-e0703n:7443: Pathavīcālako dhamma, suttathero tu taṃ pana.
anya-e0703n:7461: Rājā cittaṃ pasādetvā, taṃ theraṃ idha mabruvi.
anya-e0703n:7464: Aha mevaṃ hotu kāyo’pi, saṅghassa upakārako.
anya-e0703n:7470: Niṭṭhāpehi tuvaṃ sabbaṃ, kammaṃ sakkacca sādhukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7472: Sāyaṃ pāto ca pupphāni, mahāthūpamhi pūjaya;
anya-e0703n:7475: Paṭiyāditañca yaṃ vattaṃ, mayā sugata sāsane;
anya-e0703n:7476: Sabbaṃ aparihāpetvā, tāta vattaya taṃ tuvaṃ.
anya-e0703n:7478: Saṅghassa tāta kiccesu, mā pamajjittha sabbadā’’;
anya-e0703n:7479: Itaṃ taṃ anusāsitvā, tuṇhī āsi mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:7482: Devatā cha rathe ceva, chahi devehi ānayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7484: Yācuṃ visuṃ visuṃ devā, rājānaṃ te rathe ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:7487: Rājā tesaṃ vaco sutvā, ‘‘yāva dhammaṃ suṇomahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7494: Rājā ‘‘netaṃ tathā bhante’’, iti vatvāna taṃ vadi.
anya-e0703n:7496: Taṃ sutvāna janā keci, ‘‘bhīto maccubhayā ayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7503: Tāni laggāni lambiṃsu, rathīsāsu visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7514: Metteyyo bodhisatto hi, vasate tusite pure.
anya-e0703n:7526: Katvāna thūpaṃ saṅghañca, vanditvā tusitaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:7535: So eva māḷako ettha, vuccate ‘‘rāja māḷako’’.
anya-e0703n:7552: So saggaṃ sakale rami vo payāti tasmā,
anya-e0703n:7563: Atīva dhañño so āsi, puññakammarato sadā;
anya-e0703n:7596: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, anekāni mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:7671: Tiyo nāma brāhmaṇassa, vaco sutvā apaṇḍito;
anya-e0703n:7672: Coro asu mahātassa, parivāro ahosi ca.
anya-e0703n:7680: ‘‘Rajjaṃ tava idāneva, gaṇha tvaṃ damiḷe’’ iti;
anya-e0703n:7681: Sādhūti so damiḷehi, yujjhi gaṇhiṃsu te tu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:7683: Tato te damiḷā yuddhaṃ, raññā saha pavattayuṃ;
anya-e0703n:7688: Vāsito ca tadā āsi, ekavīsati rājusū.
anya-e0703n:7694: Vihāraṃ ettha kāressaṃ’’, iccevaṃ cintayī tadā.
anya-e0703n:7705: Asakkuṇitvā gāhetuṃ, pattaṃ bhuttaṃ jinena taṃ;
anya-e0703n:7732: Puḷahatthaṃ gahetvā taṃ, dūre vassāni bāhīyo;
anya-e0703n:7741: Pīḷayamāraṃ gahetvā so, dāṭhiyo damiḷo pana;
anya-e0703n:7753: Deviyā vacanaṃ sutvā, tassa āgamanā purā;
anya-e0703n:7756: Dhanuṃ sandhāya āyantaṃ, sīvaṃ vijjhi mahāsīvo;
anya-e0703n:7786: Damiḷehi vā’tha raññā, iti puṭṭhā tu te pana.
anya-e0703n:7789: Ubho tissa mahātissa-therā ādāya te tato.
anya-e0703n:7792: Rājā ca te amaccā ca, thero eva mayācayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7794: Siddhe kamme pesiteno, gantabbaṃ santikaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:7810: Taṃ mahātissa therassa, vihāraṃ mānado adā.
anya-e0703n:7812: Girissa yasmā gārāme, rājā kāresi sobhayo;
anya-e0703n:7820: Rathā oropitā sā hi, tasmiṃṭhāne varaṅganā;
anya-e0703n:7824: Rājā tassa vaco sutvā, vihāraṃ tattha kārayi.
anya-e0703n:7831: Tesu sattasu yodhesu, uttiyo nāma kārayi;
anya-e0703n:7835: Amacco kārayī tena, sopi taṃnāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:7844: Vihāre dema tumhākaṃ, iti vatvā adaṃsu ca.
anya-e0703n:7846: Thero sabbatthavāsesi, te te bhikkhū yathā rahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7850: Paccayehi anunehi, tena te bahavo ahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:7853: Kulasaṃsaṭṭha dosena, saṅgho taṃ nīhari ito.
anya-e0703n:7864: Evaṃ te theravādīhi, pabhinnā bhikkhavo dvidhā.
anya-e0703n:7875: Hāniṃ disvāna sattānaṃ, tadā bhikkhū samāgatā;
anya-e0703n:7892: Rajjaṃ cuddasavassāni, dhammena ca samena ca.
anya-e0703n:7894: Sahatthena kataṃ dānaṃ, so sutvāna mahapphalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:7903: Te guḷe āharāpetvā, puraṃ āgamma bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:7918: Evaṃ saddhāya so rājā, katvā puññāninekadhā;
anya-e0703n:7945: Rattā vīsena taṃ hantvā, vaṭuke rajjamappayi;
anya-e0703n:7946: Vaṭuko damiḷo so hi, pure nagaravaḍḍhakī.
anya-e0703n:7949: Rajjaṃ kāresi nagare, anulā tattha āgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:7952: Hantvā visena vaṭukaṃ, tassa rajjaṃ samappayi.
anya-e0703n:7964: Taṃ mahesiṃ karitvāna, niccaṃ tāya upaṭṭhito.
anya-e0703n:7997: Kāresi dantagehanti, vissato āsi tena so.
anya-e0703n:8039: Therā dvāraṃ māpayitvā, dhātugabbhaṃ nayiṃsu taṃ.
anya-e0703n:8057: Tatheva paṭṭavaṭṭīnaṃ, su bahūhi sikhāhi ca.
anya-e0703n:8104: Cajitvāna sakaṃ pāṇaṃ, nipajjitvā sayaṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8117: Dhajagghika to raṇāni, maṇḍayitvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:8131: Cetiyassa mahetena, pūjā sā kāritā subhā;
anya-e0703n:8146: Attānaṃ deviṃputte dve, hatthiṃ assañca maṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8168: Tuṭṭho vihāraṃ dāpesi, saṅghe bhogaṃ tatheva so.
anya-e0703n:8205: Tīṇi vassāni nagare, rajjaṃ kāresi khattiyo.
anya-e0703n:8228: Tahiṃ adisvā te rājā, kuddho tehi akārayi;
anya-e0703n:8231: Tesaṃ vicārake katvā, caṇḍāle ca ṭhapāpayi;
anya-e0703n:8234: Rājānaṃ taṃ gahetvāna, rundhitvāna sake ghare;
anya-e0703n:8235: Sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresuṃ, rañño devī tadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8240: Pesesi vatvā sandesaṃ, netvā taṃ dhātiyo tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8251: Dukkhito so ruditvāna, nāgo bhetvāna āḷakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8257: Nāvaṃ āro payitvāna, rājānaṃ tattha kuñjaro;
anya-e0703n:8278: So gahetvā balaṃ rājā, yuddhāya abhinikkhami;
anya-e0703n:8279: Taṃ sutvā lambakaṇṇā ca, yuddhāya abhisaṃyutā.
anya-e0703n:8285: Rājā nāmaṃ sāvayitvā, sayaṃ pāvisi tena so.
anya-e0703n:8305: Goṇā eterathe yuttā, tava honti rathesabha;
anya-e0703n:8323: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅgāme pattimattano;
anya-e0703n:8326: Taṃ tissavāpī kīḷāya, hantvā candamukhaṃ sivaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8335: Subhaṃ balatthaṃ taṃ rājā, rājabhūsāya bhūsiya;
anya-e0703n:8339: Yaṭṭhiṃ gahetvā hatthena, dvāramūle ṭhito sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8342: Rājā hasati evaṃ so, kurute antarantarā.
anya-e0703n:8345: Ayaṃ balattho kasmā me, sammukhāhasatī’’ti so.
anya-e0703n:8347: Mārāpayitvā rājānaṃ, balattho so subho idha;
anya-e0703n:8372: Vatvā rahassaṃ datvā ca, sahassaṃ taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n:8377: Tato paraṃ kuṭṭhino ca, rājabhāvāya nicchitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8384: So rājā dvīhi vassehi, āgamma purasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8386: Subharājaṃ raṇe hantvā, vasabho so mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:8396: Saṅghaṃ so sannipātetvā, vanditvā pucchi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:8408: Rājā sādhūti gantvāna, tathā sabbaṃ makāsi so.
anya-e0703n:8449: Tassa rañño mahesī sā, vuttanāmā manoramaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8473: Pure bahū pokkharaṇī, kārāpetvā tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:8489: Sakammaṃ karato tassa, bhattaṃ āhari dārikā.
anya-e0703n:8492: Sattame divase disvā, bhattaṃ medhāvīnī adā.
anya-e0703n:8501: Sareyyāsī’ti thero tu, tadā ca parinibbuto.
anya-e0703n:8503: Sake so vasabho rājā, vayappattamhi puttake;
anya-e0703n:8513: Rājā tuṭṭho sutassā’dā, taṃ sādhu katamaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8521: Mahāmattā tu devī sā, sarantī therabhāsitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8630: Kuḍḍanāgassa rañño tu, devīyā bhātuko tadā;
anya-e0703n:8651: Ṭhapesi so hi vohāraṃ, hiṃsā muttaṃ yatoidha;
anya-e0703n:8652: Vohāraka tissarājā, iti nāmaṃ tato ahu.
anya-e0703n:8664: Māse māse sahassaṃ so, mahāvihārassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:8682: Dāna vaṭṭaṃ ṭhapāpesi, saddhamme gāravena so.
anya-e0703n:8687: Mahā vesākha pūjaṃ so, kāretvā dīpavāsinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8694: Deviyā tassa saṃsaṭṭho, ñāto bhīto sabhātarā.
anya-e0703n:8706: Abhayo taṃ jānanatthaṃ, dūtaṃ idha visajjayi.
anya-e0703n:8708: Taṃ disvā pūgarukkhaṃ so, samantā kuntanāḷiyā;
anya-e0703n:8712: Dūto gantvā abhayassa, taṃ pavattiṃ pavedayi.
anya-e0703n:8714: Ñatvā’bhayo taṃ damiḷe, ādāya basuke tato;
anya-e0703n:8748: Taṃ sutvā abhayo pacchā, yanto pucchi punāhaso.
anya-e0703n:8755: Te puraṃ pavisitvāna, tayo rañño’ti vallabho;
anya-e0703n:8783: Visaṃ phalesu yo jesuṃ, rājabhojjāya jambuyā.
anya-e0703n:8785: Khāditvā jambupakkāni, tāni tattheva so mato;
anya-e0703n:8795: Nipajji bhūmiyaṃ rājā, katvāna iti nicchayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8800: Evaṃ nipanne bhūminde, devo pāvassi tāvade;
anya-e0703n:8806: Tato jalamhi pilavaṃ, rājā vuṭṭhāsi dhammiko;
anya-e0703n:8809: Corātahiṃ tahiṃ jātā, iti sutvāna bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:8815: Eko yakkho idhāgamma, rattakkho iti vissuto;
anya-e0703n:8824: ‘‘Apassitvāna taṃ yakkhaṃ, na cuṭṭhāmī’’ti so sayi;
anya-e0703n:8825: Tassa so dhammatejena, agā yakkho tadantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8828: ‘‘Kasmā pajaṃ me bhakkhesi, mā khāda’’iti sobravi.
anya-e0703n:8831: ‘‘Na sakkā iti vutte so, kamenekaṃti abravi.
anya-e0703n:8833: ‘‘Aññaṃ na sakkā dātuṃ me, maṃ khāda’’ iti sobravi;
anya-e0703n:8834: ‘‘Na sakkā’’iti taṃ yāci, gāme gāme baliñca so.
anya-e0703n:8836: Sādhūti vatvā bhūmindo, dipampi sakalepi ca;
anya-e0703n:8857: Goṭṭhābhayassa dassehi, bahuṃ dassati te dhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:8860: Nisinnoyeva amari, so sīsaṃ tassa ādiya.
anya-e0703n:8863: Datvā tassa dhanaṃ rañño, sakkāraṃ sādhukārayi.
anya-e0703n:8869: Kārayitvā maṇḍayitvā, so bhikkhu tattha saṅghato.
anya-e0703n:8902: Pāpakānaṃ niggahena, sodhento sāsanaṃ tu so.
anya-e0703n:8919: Rañño kulūpago āsi, rājā tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:8922: Appesi tassa bhikkhussa, so saṅgaṇhi dutiyakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:8931: Tato amacce katvāna, sayaṃ hutvāna pacchato;
anya-e0703n:8938: Saṅghamittotu so bhikkhu, bhīto tasmiṃ narādhipā.
anya-e0703n:8949: Maṇi duve mahagghe ca, mahāthūpe apūjayi;
anya-e0703n:8992: Vinayavādī mayaṃ rāja, iti gāhiya bhūpabhiṃ.
anya-e0703n:8995: Yo so sataṃ daṇḍiyo’ti, raññā daṇḍaṃ ṭhapāpayi.
anya-e0703n:9004: Rājānaṃ saññāpetvā so, thero dummati dummatiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9007: Tathā kātuṃ manusse so, yojesi duṭṭhamānaso.
anya-e0703n:9010: Soṇāmacco dāraṇo ca, bhikkhavo ca alajjino.
anya-e0703n:9019: Āgamma subahuṃ pāpaṃ, akāsi so mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:9036: Tatrā’gataṃ taṃ sutvā, sahāyaṃ so mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:9042: Ādāya taṃ sayaṃyeva, rattiṃ nikkhamma ekako;
anya-e0703n:9046: ‘‘Kasmā coro ahu me tvaṃ, ‘‘iti rājā apucchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9051: Iccheva mabravī rājā, rājānaṃ so khamāpayi;
anya-e0703n:9073: Kāretvā loharūpāni, ṭhapāpesi duve tu so.
anya-e0703n:9085: Kopetuṃ bhikkhavo keci, nilīyiṃsu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9136: Ahiṃ vā’si visaṃ khippaṃ, kareyya’tthahitaṃ budho.
anya-e0703n:9138: Ahu rājā sirimegha-vaṇṇo tassa suto tato;
anya-e0703n:9147: Kiṃ kimevā’’ti āhaṃsu, bhikkhavo taṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:9153: Amacco soṇāmacco ca, saṅghamitto ca pāpiyo;
anya-e0703n:9162: Taṃ sutvā pitukammaṃ so, nibbinno bālasaṅgame;
anya-e0703n:9163: Pitarā nāsitaṃ tattha, sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:9187: Tatraṭṭhame nivāsetvā, tato tu navame pana.
anya-e0703n:9192: Laṃkādīpe ca sakale, sabbe ādāya bhikkhavo;
anya-e0703n:9204: Vissajjetvā tahiṃ bhogaṃ, sabbaṃ therassa so pitā;
anya-e0703n:9213: Tamhā oruyha so mahā, sayaṃ hutvā purecaro;
anya-e0703n:9226: Tīhaṃ tatthāpi vāsesi, bimbaṃ taṃ jinasununo.
anya-e0703n:9231: Paṭimaṃ nīharitvā taṃ, vihāraṃ sotthiyā karaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9259: Gahetvā bahumānena, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9265: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ gehaṃ, dāṭhādhātugharaṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:9271: Tassa pūjāvidhiṃ kātu, meva rūpaṃ niyojayi.
anya-e0703n:9277: Aṭṭhavīsatime vasse, gabho so tassa yā gati.
anya-e0703n:9289: Citradantamayaṃ kiñci, tassa kammaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9294: Buddhadāso tato tassa, putto āsi mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:9307: Pitā’va putte so satte, anukampittha bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:9330: Tasmā phusitvā taṃ kammaṃ, kātuṃ sakkā na te mayā;
anya-e0703n:9333: Evaṃ putte phaṇindo so, kevalaṃ phaṇamattano;
anya-e0703n:9337: Satthaṃ gahetvā phāletvā, udaraṃ tassa bhogino.
anya-e0703n:9339: Nīharitvā tato dosaṃ, katvā bhesajja muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9340: Sappaṃ taṃ taṅkhaṇeneva, akāsi sukhitaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:9343: Tiracchānāpi jāniṃsu, sādhu rajjanti me kataṃ.
anya-e0703n:9349: Miṇiṃ taṃ nayanaṃ rājā, vihāre abhayuttare.
anya-e0703n:9355: Pāṇakā balavo hutvā, udaraṃ tassa khādisuṃ.
anya-e0703n:9357: Tato so upasaṅkamma, taṃ nivedesi rājino;
anya-e0703n:9360: So āha’’ thusavitthimhi, gāme khīrena bhojane;
anya-e0703n:9364: Rājā tassa sirāvedhaṃ, katvā ādāya lohitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9380: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n:9381: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n:9383: Anto tu ditthatuṇḍena, tena dukkhena pīḷito;
anya-e0703n:9384: Rājānaṃ magamā rājā, nidānaṃ tassa pucchiya.
anya-e0703n:9390: Vivaritvā tadā sutto, tato tassa mukhantike.
anya-e0703n:9399: Kammaṃ vijjati lokassa, kataṃ kiṃtena dukkaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:9402: Sabbādarena kubbanto, aho puñño dayo mama.
anya-e0703n:9405: Jātaṃ sattasu vāresu, sagabbhaṃ sukhitaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:9413: Bhijjitvā āsi maṇḍūko, so vuddho tattha gacchati;
anya-e0703n:9424: Yojesi vejja mekekaṃ, rājā gāma dvipañcake.
anya-e0703n:9430: Kāresi saha bhogena, sālāyo ca mahāpathe.
anya-e0703n:9436: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhe pamocesi, dukkhamhā dukkhite jane.
anya-e0703n:9439: Saddhiṃ gacchati senāya, devehi viya vāsavo.
anya-e0703n:9441: Taṃ disvā sirisobhagga-maggaṃ pattaṃ mahī patiṃ;
anya-e0703n:9457: ‘‘Ruṭṭho kimatthaṃ bho tva’’nti, pucchi sabbamavoca so.
anya-e0703n:9460: Avamaññāya maṃ mayhaṃ, parato to yāti hatthinā.
anya-e0703n:9463: Hatthaṃ me eti kāretvā, sabbaṃ dāsāna niggahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9465: No ce hatthaṃ mamā’yāti, māretvā galalohitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9466: Pivissāmi na sandeho, na cireneva passasi’’.
anya-e0703n:9468: So gantvā narapālassa, pavattiṃ taṃ nivedayi;
anya-e0703n:9477: Alabhanto sahāyaṃ me, nāsakkhi tassa ghātane;
anya-e0703n:9480: Etha gehe vasitvā me, hotha me anuvattakā;
anya-e0703n:9483: Iti vatvāna taṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, netvā so gharamattano;
anya-e0703n:9496: Matoti sutvā tassā-si hadayaṃ phalitaṃ dvidhā.
anya-e0703n:9534: Karonto tañca so rājā, mākhijjantu janā iti;
anya-e0703n:9546: Ñatvā amacco taṃ netvā, uyyānaṃ jādayīgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9547: Evaṃ paṭicca attānaṃ, dukkhaṃ nākāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9553: Loke lokahitaṃ natthi, kataṃ kiñci mahesīnā.
anya-e0703n:9568: Bhaṇantā ratanaṃ suttaṃ, siñcamānā jalaṃ tathā.
