anya-e0703n:9595: Katvā nivāpaṃ dāpesi, tadajjāpi ca vattati.
anya-e0703n:9643: Vuttaṃ vuttaṃ viyākāsi, virodhampi ca dassayi.
anya-e0703n:9657: Tattha ñāṇodayaṃ nāma, katvā makaraṇaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:9661: Taṃ disvā revato thero, idaṃ vacanamabruvi.
anya-e0703n:9672: Taṃ tattha gantvā sutvā taṃ, māgadhānaṃ niruttiyā;
anya-e0703n:9675: Evaṃ vutto pasanno so, nikkhamitvā tatoimaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9685: Potthake detha sabbe’’ti, āha vīmaṃsituṃ sataṃ.
anya-e0703n:9688: Ettha dassehi taṃ disvā, sabbe demā’’ti potthake.
anya-e0703n:9728: Evaṃ sabbe nidhanavasagā honti sattā’ti niccaṃ,
anya-e0703n:9729: Rāgaṃ sammā vinayatudhane jīvite cāpi dhīmā.
anya-e0703n:9740: Tasmiṃyeva dine bheriṃ, carāpetvā tadā tu sā.
anya-e0703n:9745: Atha macco mahāpañño, sahāyo tassa taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0703n:9748: Rajjayoggoti cintetvā, katvā taṃ bhūpatiṃ raho;
anya-e0703n:9751: Yasaṃ rajjaṃ vicāresi, chaṇe patte mahājanā;
anya-e0703n:9752: Rājā ce atthi amhehi, saddhiṃ metūti ghosayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:9758: Rañño āṇāti vutte so, agā āruyha taṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:9764: Mittaseno bahuṃ puññaṃ, katvā vassena so cuto.
anya-e0703n:9776: Dhātusenavhayo āsi, dāṭhānāmo ca taṃ suto.
anya-e0703n:9778: Gāme ambilayāgumhi, vasaṃ putte duve labhi;
anya-e0703n:9781: Mātuso dariyo tesaṃ, saddho pabbajja vattati;
anya-e0703n:9790: Sīse ākiri saṅkāraṃ, tassa ruṭṭho paroyati;
anya-e0703n:9791: Tasmiṃ cittaṃ na dūsesi, tampi disvāna mātulo.
anya-e0703n:9793: Uttamo vata’yaṃ satto, rājā hessati nicchayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9797: Sikkhāpesi kumāraṃ taṃ, paṇḍuko taṃ vijāniya.
anya-e0703n:9803: Pariveṇe na passiṃsu, tato nikkhamma te ubho.
anya-e0703n:9808: Yathā nadiyaṃ vāreti, amhe taṃ tvampi vāraya;
anya-e0703n:9809: Vāpiṃgahetvā etthe’ti, vatvā thero tadā nadiṃ.
anya-e0703n:9812: Nāgarājā tadā eko, piṭṭhiṃ pādāsi tena so.
anya-e0703n:9815: Laddhā khīrodanaṃ sutvā, sesaṃ pattena tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n:9818: Bhuñji theropi taṃ jāni, bhuñja te yaṃ mahiṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:9821: Cuto putto pipārindo, tatiyo tassa bhātuko.
anya-e0703n:9832: Hate tasmiṃ mahīpāle, dāṭhiyo damiḷo tato;
anya-e0703n:9844: Sodhetvā mediniṃ sādhu, katvā ca sukhitaṃjanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:9848: Te maṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā no, rakkhiṃsū’ti pakuppiya.
anya-e0703n:9877: Maṃ gano thūpaviṭṭhi ca, dhātusenopi uttare;
anya-e0703n:9878: Pācina kambaviṭṭhi ca, tathā antarame giri.
anya-e0703n:9887: Vāpīyo ca tathākatvā, tesameva tu dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:9938: Samantā yojane tassa, tadā rakkhañca yojayi.
anya-e0703n:9962: Yācito tehi tesaṃ’va, adāsi dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n:9967: Anto bahi ca kāretvā, nagarassa jinālaye;
anya-e0703n:9970: Tassa puññāni sabbāni, vatthu paṭipadaṃ naro;
anya-e0703n:9971: Ko hi nāma samatthoti, mukhamattaṃ nidassitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:9976: Tathā pāṇasamā ekā, duhitā ca manoramā;
anya-e0703n:9982: Ñatvā taṃ mātaraṃ tassa, naggaṃ jhapesi kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n:10002: Ne’ti gutte na jānāsi, cittametassa bhūmipa;
anya-e0703n:10005: Sutvā taṃ kupito dūte, pāhesī pitusantikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10009: Tuṇhī ahosi te gantvā, rājakassa nivedayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:10014: Parissāmīti cintetvā, āha dūte sace mamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10018: Pesesi dūte datvāna, rathaṃ jiṇṇena vājinā.
anya-e0703n:10020: Evaṃ gacchati bhūpāle, pājento rathiko rathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10021: Khādanto lājamassāpi, kiñci mattaṃ adāsi so.
anya-e0703n:10023: Taṃ khāditvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ pāṇamadā tadā;
anya-e0703n:10027: Tasmā tāsu pamajjeyya, ko hi nāma sacetano.
anya-e0703n:10029: Rājā etītisutvāna, thero so tassa soha do;
anya-e0703n:10030: Laddhā māsodanaṃ maṃsaṃ, sāṇuṇañca varaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e0703n:10035: Evaṃ nisinnā sampatta-rajjā viya ubhopi te;
anya-e0703n:10041: Tato vāpī mupagamma, oggayhitvā yathā sukhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10044: Ettakaṃ me dhanaṃ bho’ti, sutvā taṃ rājasevakā;
anya-e0703n:10047: Dhanaṃ rakkhati puttassa, dīpe bhindati mānuse;
anya-e0703n:10050: Mārehi pitaraṃ meti, diṭṭhā piṭṭhīti verino;
anya-e0703n:10054: Rājādisvā ca cintesi, pāpiyo’yaṃ mataṃ mama.
anya-e0703n:10056: Kāyaṃ viya dukkhāpetvā, narakaṃ hetu micchati;
anya-e0703n:10059: Iti mettāyamāno taṃ, āha senāpatiṃ pati;
anya-e0703n:10069: Ko hi rajjeyya bhogesu, jīvitepi yasepi vā.
anya-e0703n:10071: Dhātuseno narindo so, evaṃ puttahato gato;
anya-e0703n:10097: Tattha nisseṇi gehāni, tena taṃ nāmako ahū.
anya-e0703n:10100: Attano nihitānaṃ so, rakkhaṃ datvā tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:10112: Muccissāmi kataṃ nu’ti, puññaṃ kāsi anappakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10114: Mahā vatthuni kāresi, dvāresu nagarassa so;
anya-e0703n:10115: Ambuyyāne ca kāresi, dīpe yojana yojane.
anya-e0703n:10118: Adhikaṃ bhogagāme ca, adhikaṃ tassa dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:10120: Bodhi uppalavaṇṇā ca, tassāsuṃ dhītaro duve;
anya-e0703n:10123: Dente tasmiṃ na icchiṃsu, samaṇā theravādino;
anya-e0703n:10127: Bhikkhave adhivāsesuṃ, bhogo no satthuno iti.
anya-e0703n:10129: Kathā niyyanti uyyāne, samīpe pabbatassa so;
anya-e0703n:10130: Kārāpesi vihāraṃ so, tesaṃ nāmo tato ahu.
anya-e0703n:10142: Samādiyi dhutaṅge ca, likhāpesi ca potthake.
anya-e0703n:10145: Bhito so paralokamhā, moggallānā ca vattati.
anya-e0703n:10153: Rājā sutvā gahetvā taṃ, bhañjissāmiti nikkhami;
anya-e0703n:10165: Disvā taṃ sāmikono’yaṃ, palāyati bhaṇe iti;
anya-e0703n:10171: Katvā’ḷāhana kiccaṃ so, tassa kamme pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:10174: Bhikkhū sutvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sunivatthā supārutā;
anya-e0703n:10181: Chattattena saṅghaṃ pūjesi, saṅgho tasseva taṃ adā.
anya-e0703n:10183: Taṃ ṭhānaṃ chattavaḍḍhīti, vohariṃsu tahiṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n:10189: Kuddho nīhari dāṭhaṃso, ghātakaṃ pituno mama;
anya-e0703n:10190: Anuvattitvā maccāti, tena rakkhasa nāma vā.
anya-e0703n:10199: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ dānaṃ, dīpe ajjāpi vattati.
anya-e0703n:10204: Taṃ disvā paridevitvā, pituno pema mattanī;
anya-e0703n:10233: Ammaṃ saṅghassa pādāsi, saṅgho tasmiṃ pasīdiya;
anya-e0703n:10234: Āha’mba sāmaṇero’ti, tena taṃ nāmako ahu.
anya-e0703n:10239: Tassa katvāna sakkāraṃ, gahetvā kesa dhātuyo;
anya-e0703n:10246: Ṭhapesi paṭimāyo ca, assa bimbañca cārukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10264: Katvā’ṭṭhārasame vasse, so puññāni khayaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:10267: Jetuṃ no visahittha maccumupagaṃ so yevadāsoviya;
anya-e0703n:10268: Tasmā maccubalaṃ nihacca sukhino hessanti medhāvino;
anya-e0703n:10277: Ahu tassa suto rājā, devarūpo mahābalo.
anya-e0703n:10285: Tittiseno suto tassa, rājā hutvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:10286: Katvā puññāni rajjaṃ taṃ, māsampi navame jahi.
anya-e0703n:10288: Sivo taṃ mātulo hantvā, hutvā rājā anappakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10291: Upatisso tato āsi, rājā hantvāna sīvakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10297: Eko putto ahu rañño, upatissassa kassapo;
anya-e0703n:10304: Dakkhiṇaṃ malayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhitvā mahā balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10307: Taṃ sutvā kassapo jeṭṭho, varamāruyha kuñjaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:10313: Hatthe katvā upāyena, dese pācina pacchime.
anya-e0703n:10325: Yujjhitvā viralā āsuṃ, tato cintesi kassapo.
anya-e0703n:10328: Parihīnaṃ balaṃ rājā, andhako ca mahallako.
anya-e0703n:10331: Aṅgahetvā balaṃ pacchā, coro niggaṇhi yo iti.
anya-e0703n:10339: Silākāḷo pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā saṅgamma vegasā;
anya-e0703n:10346: Puñchitvā lohitaṃ katvā, kosiyaṃ asi puttikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10360: Anvahaṃ pūjayi bodhiṃ, paṭimāyo ca kārayi;
anya-e0703n:10376: Gantvā tattha vasāhīti, sopi gantvā tahiṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n:10384: Tassa dvādasame vasse, ito kāsi puraṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:10393: Ṭhapetvā anuvassaṃ tu, netvā jetavanaṃ mahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10394: Kātuṃ kāresi cārittaṃ, hitaṃ mantvāna pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10411: Sāparādhāna te me vā, manussā dīpavāsino;
anya-e0703n:10414: Tasmā aññena yujjhantu, ubhoyeva mayaṃ idha;
anya-e0703n:10418: Āruyha munino māro viya otthari tāvade.
anya-e0703n:10429: Rājā ārabhi taṃ disvā, chindituṃ sīsamattano;
anya-e0703n:10433: Chaḍḍesi chahi so rajjaṃ, māsehi divasehi ca.
anya-e0703n:10435: Moggallāno tato rājā, āsi dīpe mahābalo;
anya-e0703n:10463: Datvā bhutvā yathākāmaṃ, vasse vīsatime mari.
anya-e0703n:10474: Mahesī sā sadā āsi, padhānā sabbakammasu;
anya-e0703n:10478: Dubbale ca viheṭhesuṃ, balī jānapadā narā.
anya-e0703n:10495: Bījaṃ bhaginī māyāci, bījagāhañca tassa sā;
anya-e0703n:10501: Taṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā so, aladdhā kiñci bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10508: Datvā āhari āhāraṃ, so taṃ bhutvā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n:10517: So bhīto purime yāme, āgataṃ taṃ na sambhusī.
anya-e0703n:10520: Gahetvā khipi tīheva, aṅgulīhi sataṃ chupi.
anya-e0703n:10522: So taṃ byākāsi taṃ ditvā, sabalaṃ me parissamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10523: Tīhi rājūhi yujjhitvā, catutthaṃ tvaṃ nighātiya.
anya-e0703n:10525: Vuḍḍho tīṇeva vassāni, rājā hutvā na jīvasi;
anya-e0703n:10526: Tathā hessanti rājāno, tayo te vaṃsajā narā.
anya-e0703n:10528: Gantvā sevassu rājānaṃ, pacchā passasi mekhalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10529: Iti vatvāna pesesi, sopi gantvā narissaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:10532: Taṃ akāsi taduṭṭhānaṃ, bhaṇḍamāhari so bahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:10535: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ tassa, gantuṃ tattheva yojayi.
anya-e0703n:10538: Ādāya gantvā taṃ desaṃ, parivattesi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n:10540: Paccekabhogaṃ katvāna, rohaṇaṃ tattha so vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10546: Rajjaṃ gahetuṃ kāloti, sīghaṃ āgamma rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n:10549: Sayaṃ hutvā mahīpālo, desaṃ katvā yathā pure;
anya-e0703n:10585: Sappañño taṃ saranto bhavatu bhavasukhaṃ vantukāmo hitesī.
anya-e0703n:10646: Keḷivāte ca kāresi, sumanaṃ nāma pabbataṃ;
anya-e0703n:10652: Gāmaṃ datvā niyojesi, ārakkhaṃ dhītu nāmakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10655: Dāṭhā sivassa ṭhatvāna, ovāde sādhu bhikkhuno;
anya-e0703n:10665: Bhikkhūnaṃ catusaṭṭhīnaṃ, vihāraṃ taṃ tadā adā.
anya-e0703n:10682: Chattaṃ soṇṇañca kāresi, nikāyesupi tīsu so;
anya-e0703n:10686: Tattha tattha ca pūjesi, mahagghaṃ ratanuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10698: Hatthamukkhippi taṃ hantuṃ, gaṇḍo sañjāyi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n:10704: Rakkhituṃ taṃ niyojesi, theraṃ sopi tamācari.
anya-e0703n:10707: Katvevaṃ bahudhā puññaṃ, catuttiṃse same mato.
anya-e0703n:10709: Aggabodhi tato āsi, rājā pubbassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:10725: Jotipālamhi pabbaji, rājā sakkāsi taṃ ciraṃ.
anya-e0703n:10743: Vandamāne pabhijjitvā, bhāgo taṃ purato pati.
anya-e0703n:10746: Rājā disvāva saṃviggo, kammaṃ paṭṭhapi taṃkhaṇe.
anya-e0703n:10754: Sace rājā papañceti, kātuṃ dhātugharaṃ mayaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10757: Rājā pabuddho saṃviggo, na cireneva kārayi;
anya-e0703n:10760: Catasso paṭimāyo ca, pallaṅke ca silāmaye;
anya-e0703n:10781: Nāmaṃ katvāna so’kāsi, attano ca mahesiyā;
anya-e0703n:10794: Evaṃ puññāni katvā so, divaṃ’gā dasame same.
anya-e0703n:10797: Maccusseva vasaṃ tatohi matimā sammā bhavassīdisaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10798: Passanto niyamaṃ vihāya vidhinā sabbaṃ bhave saṅgatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:10807: Sāsanassa ca raṭṭhassa, vuddhikāmo naye rato.
anya-e0703n:10819: Balaṃ so sannipātento, vāsaṃ tattheva kappayi.
anya-e0703n:10828: Yena kenaci lesena, sayaṃ dukkhiva dummano.
anya-e0703n:10830: Āturo viya bāḷhaṃ so, hosi mañcaparāyano;
anya-e0703n:10834: Handa tvaṃ nagaraṃ rakkha, nate sakkā mayā saha.
anya-e0703n:10840: Rājā dvisvā’ti nibinno, yāva mando na hessati.
anya-e0703n:10849: Putto disvā narindassa, ghātessāmi imaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:10851: Āha rājā nivāresi, mā te rucci balaṃ idaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10860: Corassa senā taṃ ditvā, haritvā sāmino adā;
anya-e0703n:10864: Gantvā taṃ parivāresi, rājā āsi tadekako.
anya-e0703n:10872: Upāgamma puraṃ rājā, āsī laṅkā talādhipo;
anya-e0703n:10873: Tato cintesi jīvante, sattumhi na sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:10875: So sutvā pubbarājassa, putto etthāti kujjhiya;
anya-e0703n:10878: Upakkami tadā raññā, āṇatto puriso khaṇe;
anya-e0703n:10879: Chindituṃ hatthapādaṃ so, kumāro rodi dummano.
anya-e0703n:10881: Pūvakhādakahatthaṃ me, chindeyyaṃ ce tadā ahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:10882: Khādisaṃ tena pūveti, haṃ sutvā rājakammiko.
anya-e0703n:10885: Vāmaṃ hatthañca pādañca, tassa chindi narādhamo.
anya-e0703n:10897: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesuṃ, rājā sutvā visesato.
anya-e0703n:10902: Sīsaṃ gaṇhatha tattheva, rañño ca tanayassa ca;
anya-e0703n:10909: Sīsaṃ me paṭhamaṃ chetvā, detha mayhaṃ sukhaṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:10915: Tattha laggā kathaṃ niccaṃ, sukhaṃ bho na gavesatha.
anya-e0703n:10920: Chinnasīso mayā diṭṭho, mayi jīvati sāmiko;
anya-e0703n:10921: Ṭhapetvā hampi sevāmi, aho aññañhi sāmikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:10923: Idha taṃ mārayitvāna, chāyaṃ tassa harissatha;
anya-e0703n:10924: Aho aññāṇakā tumhe, maññe ummattakā iti.
anya-e0703n:10926: Iti vatvāna so pāde, gahetvā sāmino sayi;
anya-e0703n:10927: Tassa te haraṇopāyaṃ, apassantā yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n:10929: Tassāpi sīsaṃ chetvāna, maccā ādāya tīṇi’pi;
anya-e0703n:10957: Vihāraṃ naṃ bahunnaṃ so, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n:10966: Taṃ sutvā so asiggāho, saputto rohaṇaṃgato.
anya-e0703n:10968: Vasanto tattha so katvā, hatthe janapadaṃ lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:10978: Upaddutā matā āsuṃ, taṃ sutvā so asiggaho.
anya-e0703n:10987: Sāsanaṃ tassa pesesi, ehi rājā bhavāhīti.
anya-e0703n:10989: So taññatvā palāyitvā, nivatto malayaṃ agā;
anya-e0703n:10990: Kathañhi laddhaṃ kicchena, rajjaṃso deti me iti.
anya-e0703n:10992: Evaṃ kho dallanāmaṃ so, moggallānaṃ narissaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:11016: Gantvāna paratīraṃ so, ādāya damiḷe bahū;
anya-e0703n:11019: Rājāpi sutvā taṃ gantvā, yujjhitvā rājamittake;
anya-e0703n:11020: Gāme hantvāna taṃ tena, damiḷe saddhimāgate.
anya-e0703n:11023: Adāsi dāse katvāna, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:11026: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ visodhetvā, vasante akuto bhaye.
anya-e0703n:11029: Dussīle bahule disvā, pabbajjāya navopi so.
anya-e0703n:11032: Rājā te neva kāresi, dhammakammaṃ vihārake.
anya-e0703n:11034: Dussīlā nihaṭā tena, sabbe mantiya ekato;
anya-e0703n:11035: Raho taṃ mārayitvāna, taṃ kammaṃ paṭibāhayyuṃ.
anya-e0703n:11037: Rājā sutvā tadā kuddho, sabbegaṇhiya ekato;
anya-e0703n:11040: Aññe tattha sataṃ bhikkhū, jambudīpe khipāpayi;
anya-e0703n:11043: Bhikkhū theriyavāde so, kātuṃ tehi uposathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11046: Akkositvā ca bhāsitvā, vācāhi pharusāhi so;
anya-e0703n:11049: Tassa so mahatā phuṭṭho, rogena marisajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11052: Tassa putto tato agga-bodhi nāmo kumārako;
anya-e0703n:11058: Rājā so pubbarājūnaṃ, pavattaṃ na vināsiya;
anya-e0703n:11061: Jeṭṭhatisso’tha taṃ sabbaṃ, suṇitvā malaye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:11071: Sabalaṃ pacchimaṃ desaṃ, so gantvā taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n:11088: Jeṭṭhatisso tato hutvā, pure rājāyathā pure;
anya-e0703n:11113: Tattha tattha nilīnā te, desaṃ hantumupakkamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:11118: Paratīraṃ gato rājā, gahetvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11140: Chetvā hatthimhi appetvā, churikaṃ kosiyaṃ khipi.
anya-e0703n:11152: Khipitvā churikaṃ āha, evaṃ devo mato iti.
anya-e0703n:11154: Sā taṃ disvā-tisokena, phāletvā hadayaṃ matā;
anya-e0703n:11155: Evaṃ pañcahi māsehi, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:11158: Rajjaṃ pākatikaṃ katvā, viharanto pure vare.
anya-e0703n:11178: Māṇassa maraṇaṃ sutvā, gahetvā damiḷe lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:11185: Ekāvaliṃ gahetvāva, ekākī so hi nikkhami.
anya-e0703n:11197: Gaṇhī tīsu nikāyesu, sāraṃ dhātugharesu ca.
anya-e0703n:11227: Nāsakkhi kira vāretuṃ, aho pāpā nivāriyā.
anya-e0703n:11235: Tatra ṭhito soḷasame, vasse byādhihato mato;
anya-e0703n:11236: Tadā tassa kaṇiṭṭho so, yuvarājāpi kassapo.
anya-e0703n:11293: Tassāsuṃ bahavo puttā, jeṭṭho tesañca māṇako;
anya-e0703n:11296: Tato so byādhinā phuṭṭho, atekicchena kenaci;
anya-e0703n:11297: Puttā me bālakā sabbe, ne’te rajjakkhamā iti.
anya-e0703n:11300: Āhuya sabbaṃ pādāsi, rajjaṃ puttehi attano.
anya-e0703n:11311: Ekato damiḷā hutvā, nibbāsema imaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:11312: Tasmiṃ ṭhite bahiddhāva, aggahesuṃ puraṃ sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11318: Pitā sutvāna taṃ āgā, na cīreneva rohaṇā.
anya-e0703n:11321: Umiḷehi tato jātā, sabbe te samavuttino.
anya-e0703n:11323: Tato so pitaraṃ rajje, abhisiñcittha māṇako;
anya-e0703n:11330: Khaṇenā’gā imaṃ dīpaṃ, gahetvā damiḷhaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11332: Tadā te damiḷā sabbe, paribhūtā idha ṭhitā;
anya-e0703n:11335: Māṇopi sutvā taṃ sabbaṃ, nāyaṃ kāloti yujjhituṃ;
anya-e0703n:11338: Pubbadesaṃ sayaṃ gantvā, saṅgaṇhanto janaṃ vasī;
anya-e0703n:11339: Laddhā damiḷapakkhaṃ so, gahetvā rājakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:11342: Mātulaṃ viya taṃ loko, tena nāmena vohari.
anya-e0703n:11366: Theriyā te kibāhetvā, balaṃ tatheva kārayi.
anya-e0703n:11368: Atha te te theriyā bhikkhū, dummaññū tattha rājini;
anya-e0703n:11371: Vuttañhi muninā tena, assaddho yo upāsako;
anya-e0703n:11372: Alābhāya ca bhikkhūnaṃ, ceteta’kkosati ca te.
anya-e0703n:11374: Pattanikujjanaṃ tassa, kattabbanti tato hi te;
anya-e0703n:11375: Tassa taṃ kammamakaruṃ, loko maññittha aññathā.
anya-e0703n:11380: Tasmiṃ so samaye phuṭṭho, byādhinā mahatāmari;
anya-e0703n:11383: Dappulopi tato rājā, gato rohaṇakaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11398: Ekāva dhītā tassāsi, rājanamagamā ca sā;
anya-e0703n:11414: Sayaṃ vaccakuṭī esa, tattha sodhesi buddhimā.
anya-e0703n:11422: Isseraṃ tattha vattesi, sampamaddiya satta vo;
anya-e0703n:11425: Tassa tuṭṭho jano āha, mahāsāmīti esano;
anya-e0703n:11429: Tassa pādāsi santuṭṭho, guṇehi bahukehi ca.
anya-e0703n:11435: Dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā, tasmiṃ taṃ bahumānituṃ.
anya-e0703n:11437: Vihāraṃ rohaṇe katvā, tassa pādāsi sopi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:11465: Akāsi ca sayaṃ sādhu, parivārehī kārayi.
anya-e0703n:11468: Vihārā nekakā āsuṃ, katā tehi sappaccayā.
anya-e0703n:11470: Kadāci maggaṃ gacchaṃ so, araññamhi agāmake;
anya-e0703n:11476: Alabhanto tadā niddaṃ, kinnu kho iti kāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11479: Adisvā kāraṇaṃ anto, avassaṃ bahi hessati;
anya-e0703n:11482: Evamāha ca nissaṅkaṃ, ayyakā mama rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11483: Tementā rukkhamūlasmiṃ, ṭhitā ānetha te iti.
anya-e0703n:11488: Te gantvā sāsanaṃ rañño, ārocesuṃ padhāviso;
anya-e0703n:11489: Disvā ca bhikkhu santuṭṭho, netvā vāsagharaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11495: Nisīdāpiya te sabbe, sayane sādhu santhate.
anya-e0703n:11507: Katvāna pituno senaṃ, dhanaṃ cevā harāpiya.
anya-e0703n:11513: Yodhā dāṭho patissassa, māṇaṃ saṅgaṃva mārayuṃ.
anya-e0703n:11515: Taṃ sutvā dappulo sopi, sokasallahato mari;
anya-e0703n:11519: Tasmā tassa kathā āsi, rohaṇamhi idhāpi ca.
anya-e0703n:11543: Yattha katthaci disvāpi, bhikkhavo so mahāmati;
anya-e0703n:11556: Bhogagāme ca dāpesi, tattha tattha bahūdaye.
anya-e0703n:11570: Ete aññe ca so datvā, bhogagāme narissaro;
anya-e0703n:11571: Dāsi ārāmike ceva, attano kira ñātake.
anya-e0703n:11574: Disvāpi ca sutvā vā, bhogagāme bahū adā.
anya-e0703n:11579: Anussaranto so tiṇṇaṃ, ratanānaṃ guṇe vare;
anya-e0703n:11589: Gāmaṃ niṭṭhilaveṭṭhiñca, tassā’dā so sadā sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11604: Bhassa rañño’ nuvattantā, evaṃ dhammīhi pāṇino.
anya-e0703n:11623: Dīpe maṇḍalikā sabbe, tattha tattha yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11644: Rājā bhaṇḍañca taṃ sabbaṃ, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11647: Evaṃ soḷasame vasse, rājā āsi divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n:11653: Vinā raññā na sakkāti, mediniṃ paribhuñjituṃ;
anya-e0703n:11657: Tassa nāmaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sayaṃ sabbaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n:11666: Tampi rajje bhisiñcitvā, yathā pubbaṃ sayaṃvasī.
anya-e0703n:11680: Rañño tassaccaye rājā, māṇavammo ahosi so;
anya-e0703n:11681: Kiṃ gotto kassa putto ca, kathaṃ rajjamapāpuṇi.
anya-e0703n:11687: Taṃ labhitvā vasaṃ dese, uttare līnavuttiko.
anya-e0703n:11692: Gantvā vatvā sakaṃ nāmaṃ, sevituṃ tamupakkami;
anya-e0703n:11710: So taṃ gahetvā cintesi, sakhaṃ pesa narādhipo;
anya-e0703n:11711: Ucchiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiṃ hoti, sattānaṃ paramatthato.
anya-e0703n:11713: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayāpātu-mīti cintiya taṃ pivi;
anya-e0703n:11716: Rājāpi disvā taṃ bhīto, tassapī tāva sesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11717: Sayaṃ pivi tathāhoti, kammaṃ puññavataṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n:11720: Bhojane sayane ceva, parihāre ca vāhane.
anya-e0703n:11725: Ayaṃ kho mama sevāya, rajjaṃ vaṃsa gataṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11728: Sace sopi mayā gantvā, yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:11729: Takkitaṃ tassa mayhañca, sabbaṃ tamaphalaṃ bhave.
anya-e0703n:11731: Evaṃ cintiyataṃ rājā, nivattetvā sake pure;
anya-e0703n:11735: Rājā mīyati yuddhamhi, kiṃ phalaṃ mama jīvite.
anya-e0703n:11740: Tasmā yuttaṃ mayā gantuṃ, sahasaṅgāma maṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11741: Sukhañhi saddhiṃ tenettha, jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃpi vā.
anya-e0703n:11744: Gantvā dassesi attānaṃ, so taṃ saṅgāma maṇḍale.
anya-e0703n:11747: Saho santhavametasmiṃ, kattabbaṃ me kataṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:11749: Tato mānassa senā ca, senā cevassarājino;
anya-e0703n:11756: Āliṅgatvā sinehena, tvaṃ kho me jayado iti.
anya-e0703n:11761: Athevaṃ cintayi rājā, kattabbaṃ me sahāyako;
anya-e0703n:11770: Mayāpi tassa kattabbaṃ, kammaṃ sādhu sukhāvahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11773: Evaṃ vutte amaccā te, paccāhaṃsu mahīpati;
anya-e0703n:11774: Yaṃ yamicchati devohi, taṃ taṃ ruccati no iti.
anya-e0703n:11776: Atha so māṇavammassa, senaṃ datvā savāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11791: Tadā sā damiḷi senā, assosi kira sāmiko;
anya-e0703n:11797: Māṇavammo ca cintesi, sabbā senā gatā mama;
anya-e0703n:11798: Mate mayi samijjheyya, verino me manorathaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11801: Puna rajjaṃ gahessaṃti, tasmā evamakāsi so.
anya-e0703n:11809: Rajjatthaṃ me sahā yo maṃ, sevantoyeva addhago;
anya-e0703n:11810: Vuddho hessati taṃ passaṃ, kathaṃ rajjaṃ karomahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11812: Imasmiṃ pana vārasmiṃ, pesayitvā balaṃ mama;
anya-e0703n:11813: Rajjaṃ taṃ na gahessāmi, ko attho jīvitena me.
anya-e0703n:11815: Evaṃ cintiya so senaṃ, sannipātiya attano;
anya-e0703n:11822: Nāvaṃ ārohituṃ sabbe, na icchiṃsu tadā janā.
anya-e0703n:11824: Tadā sīho vicintetvā, sayaṃ hutvā tirohito;
anya-e0703n:11828: Āropetvāna taṃ nāvaṃ, gaccha ṭhatvāna sāgare.
anya-e0703n:11831: So’pi sabbaṃ tathākāsi, rājāno agamā iti.
anya-e0703n:11833: Āruhiṃsu janā nāvaṃ, ekaṃ katvā narādhipaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11834: So taṃ senaṅgamādāya, māṇo gantuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n:11837: Atha so paṭṭanaṃ patvā, otaritvā savāhano.
anya-e0703n:11839: Vissāmetvā balaṃ tattha, vasaṃ katipaye dine;
anya-e0703n:11854: Tato taṃ sāmiko disvā, sahāyo me ayaṃciraṃ;
anya-e0703n:11855: Tasmā na sakkā caḍḍetuṃ, āpade saraṇāgataṃ.
anya-e0703n:11857: Sāmino ca sahāyassa, niddosohaṃ kathaṃ bhave;
anya-e0703n:11858: Iti cintiya pūvaṃ so, savisaṃ khādiyā’mari.
anya-e0703n:11860: Kuṭṭhakopi ca teneva, khāditvā pūvakaṃ mato;
anya-e0703n:11863: Māṇavammo tato dīpe, chattaṃ ussāpayi tadā;
anya-e0703n:11864: Vārento viya teneva, dukkhaṃ dīpe janassa so.
anya-e0703n:11867: Samattho kohi taṃ sabbaṃ, vattuṃ paṭipadaṃ naro.
anya-e0703n:11878: [Ettha māṇavammassa rajjakathāya ūnatā dissati. Ito paṭṭhāya aggabodhissa rajjapaṭibaddhā kathā vira khāyati.]
anya-e0703n:11882: Dāsi dhammarucinaṃ so, rājinī dīpakampi ca.
anya-e0703n:11906: Dānabhaṇḍañca so sabbaṃ, sabbesaṃ dāsi pāṇinaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11909: Dhammañca tesaṃ deseti, dātuṃ lokuttaraṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11911: Kammaṃ sovaggiyaṃ tassa, rajje sabbo samācari;
anya-e0703n:11912: Yaṃ karoti mahīpālo, taṃ tassa kurute jano.
anya-e0703n:11921: Vinayaṃ yanti sabbepi, kotaṃ nāseyya paṇḍito.
anya-e0703n:11923: Payogo yo hi sattānaṃ, lohadvaya hitāvaho;
anya-e0703n:11926: Attano so nivatthāni, vatthāni sukhumāni ca;
anya-e0703n:11930: Sāvajjo paribhogo vā, tassa nāhosi sabbaso.
anya-e0703n:11932: Ye ye sattā yadā hārā, tesaṃ taṃ taṃ sadāpayi;
anya-e0703n:11933: Ye yena sukhī honti, te te tena sukhāpayī.
anya-e0703n:11938: Atha tassa nujo rājā, kassapo hoti khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:11941: Pitā viya niyaṃ puttaṃ, so saṅgaṇhi mahājanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11960: Mato pubbeva tasmā, so saranto taṃ na icchitaṃ.
anya-e0703n:11965: Teneva vuttaṃ muninā, dhammā yekeci lokiyā;
anya-e0703n:11968: Kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma, sabbe te honti pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:11971: Ādipādova so tasmā, hutvā rajjaṃ vicārayi;
anya-e0703n:11977: Desaṃ datvāna pācinaṃ, vasituṃ tattha pesiya;
anya-e0703n:11983: Adatvā yācakānaṃ so, nu kiñci paribhuñjati;
anya-e0703n:11984: Bhuttaṃ vā satiyā deti, dvi guṇaṃ attabhuttato.
anya-e0703n:11999: Mato āsi tato tassa, rajjaṃ hatthagataṃ ahu.
anya-e0703n:12001: So taṃ hatthagataṃ katvā, saṇṭhapetvāna sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12004: Sa āgantvā ahu rājā, silāmeghoti saññito;
anya-e0703n:12007: So rājā naṃ niyojetvā, cintā bhāraṃ vimuñciya;
anya-e0703n:12008: Bhoge bhuñjatha tumheti, sayaṃ rajjaṃ vicārayi.
anya-e0703n:12011: Dese ubbinayaṃ sabbaṃ, maggaṃ pāpesi cakkhumā.
anya-e0703n:12014: Na labhantā vicintesuṃ, bhinditabbā ime iti.
anya-e0703n:12017: Tuvaṃ rājāsi nāmena, rājā añño sabhāvaho.
anya-e0703n:12020: Saṅgayha na cireneva, hoti rājā na saṃsayo.
anya-e0703n:12023: Kumāropi vidhitvā taṃ, coro hutvāna rājindo.
anya-e0703n:12025: Palāyitvā sakaṃ desaṃ, saṅgaṇhitvā tahiṃ jane;
anya-e0703n:12029: Gato tattha parājitvā, kumāro malayaṃ vaso.
anya-e0703n:12031: Tato rājā kataññū so, upakāraṃ sabhātuno;
anya-e0703n:12034: Kumāropi ca taṃ sutvā, ahosi muducittako;
anya-e0703n:12037: Rājā gantvā sayaṃyeva, malayaṃ ekako vaṃso;
anya-e0703n:12038: Kumāraṃ taṃ samādāya, āgamittha sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:12043: Tāya saddhiṃ vasanto so, vissattho tena rājinā;
anya-e0703n:12044: Pahāraṃ tāya pādāsi, duṭṭho dosamhi kismiṃci.
anya-e0703n:12047: Akāraṇe maṃ māreti, dinno vo sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n:12049: Sopi taṃ sutamatteva, dukkataṃ vata me iti;
anya-e0703n:12050: Pabbājesi lahuṃ gantvā, bhikkhūnī na mupassayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12056: Aññato taṃ gahetvāna, gato ekova rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12064: Kasiṇaṃ rohaṇaṃ hattha-gataṃ katvā mahā balo;
anya-e0703n:12065: Yujjhitvā tena taṃ gaṇhi, bhariyaṃ saṅghamattano.
anya-e0703n:12067: Tato paṭṭhāya sukhitā, samaggā te tayo janā;
anya-e0703n:12073: Hatthi kucchivihāre ca, vihāre puna piṭṭhike;
anya-e0703n:12077: Kāsi pākatikaṃ tattha, thambhe ca parivattayi.
anya-e0703n:12079: Evaṃ katvāna puññāni, puññāni ca yathābalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12088: Mahābodhissa kāresi, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ;
anya-e0703n:12089: Ārāme dve ca kāresi, kaḷandaṃ mallavātakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12103: Tato pubbeva tassāsi, putto so yuvarājako;
anya-e0703n:12104: Mato kira tato rajjaṃ, aputtaṃ taṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:12106: Putto mahindo nāmā’si, silā meghassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:12112: Datvā tesaṃ dhanaṃ sādhu, pavattiṃ taṃ nigūhayi;
anya-e0703n:12113: Atha naṃ so vayappattaṃ, katvā senāpatiṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12115: Rajjaṃ vasseva katvāna, sabbaṃ hatthe sayaṃvasī;
anya-e0703n:12116: So dhammena vicāresi, rāja kiccaṃ mahāmati.
anya-e0703n:12119: Senāpaccaṃ na gaṇhittha, nayaññū tassa hatthako.
anya-e0703n:12121: Tadā kenaci gantvā so, karaṇīyena rājino;
anya-e0703n:12125: Corā rajjaṃ gahetvāna, nāseyyuṃ nagaraṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:12130: So taṃ sutvā mahāseno, gantvā uttaradesakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12133: Gantvā rañño mataṭhānaṃ, disvā deviṃ parodiya;
anya-e0703n:12136: Mācintesi mahādevī, mato me sāmiko iti;
anya-e0703n:12137: Rakkhissāmi ahaṃ dīpaṃ, tumhe rajjaṃ karissatha.
anya-e0703n:12140: Raho yojayī taṃ hantuṃ, vatthukāmā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n:12142: Senāpati taṃ ñatvāna, tassā’rakkhaṃ vidhāya so;
anya-e0703n:12146: Ādāya taṃ puraṃ gantvā, rajjaṃ gaṇhi sasādhanaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12157: Deviñca taṃ samādāya, agamā tattha sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12163: Palāpetvāna taṃ tattha, senāpati sukhaṃ vasi.
anya-e0703n:12166: Dese sabbe samāgamma, aggahesuṃ puraṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:12168: So hi te paṭibāhesi, sūro dhīraparakkamo;
anya-e0703n:12174: Pacchā anu balappatto, dappulo malayaṃ gato;
anya-e0703n:12184: Gajjitena bhaṭānañca, ākāsaṃ na tadā phali.
anya-e0703n:12190: Nagaraṃ no’parundhiṃsu, kintu kattabba mettha vo.
anya-e0703n:12192: Evaṃ vuttā tamāhaṃsu, sūrā tassa raṇatthino;
anya-e0703n:12195: Evaṃ bhūte sace kāle, ohīnā jīvibhatthino;
anya-e0703n:12196: Posesi sāmi kiṃ kāla-mettakaṃ no yathā sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12198: Vutte evaṃ saussāho, balaṃ sajjiya rattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12202: Saddhiṃ yo dhasahassehi, saṅgāmaṃ kāsi dussahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12204: Balaṃ taṃ ādipādassa, nipphoṭetvā tato tato;
anya-e0703n:12210: Rājaputte duve ceva, rohaṇamhā tadā gate;
anya-e0703n:12211: Jīvaggāhaṃ sagāhetvā, te ādāya puraṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:12213: Evaṃ pattajayo sūro, dīpe jāte nirākule;
anya-e0703n:12216: Tepi gantvāna desaṃ taṃ, uttaraṃ desameva ca;
anya-e0703n:12219: Rājāpi taṃ mahādeviṃ, bhariyaṃ kāsi attano;
anya-e0703n:12225: Rañño sā’tipiyā āsi, tato paṭṭhāya sopi kho;
anya-e0703n:12229: Vinā so’yanti amhākaṃ, ubho hutvāna ekato.
anya-e0703n:12235: Rājā sabbaṃ nisamme’taṃ, maṇḍalīke tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:12246: Atha rājā mahāseno, samugghātesi taṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12247: Dappuḷo so palāyittha, ādi pādā duve hatā.
anya-e0703n:12258: Rājā so puttanattānaṃ, desaṃ kātuṃ nirākulaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12264: Ārocetvā pavattiṃ taṃ, tehi sammā pakāsito;
anya-e0703n:12267: Dīpe sabbattha yojetvā, kattabbaṃ nagarepi ca;
anya-e0703n:12271: Taṃ disvā rohaṇe sabbe, bhītā taṃ vasamāgamuṃ.
anya-e0703n:12274: Hatthī asse ca maṇayo, gahetvā tassa hatthato.
anya-e0703n:12309: Jiṇṇe devakūle katvā, bahuke tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n:12318: Anāthā ye salajjā ca, te ca saṅgaṇhi so raho;
anya-e0703n:12325: Puññamevaṃ vidhaṃ tassa, appameyyaṃ bahuṃ kira.
anya-e0703n:12327: Tassa putto tadā āsi, yuvarājā divaṅgato;
anya-e0703n:12328: Jāto senāpati kāle, aparo atthi dārako.
anya-e0703n:12330: Taṃ rājā rājaputtehi, bhīto rājāraho iti;
anya-e0703n:12331: Māretuṃ taṃ na sakkonti, vaḍḍhapesi yathā tathā.
anya-e0703n:12333: Arīhi nagare ruddhe, pitaraṃ so kirekadā;
anya-e0703n:12339: Kāloyamīti mantvā so, bandhitvā churikaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:12343: Rājā disvā pasanno taṃ, senāpaccañca tassa’dā.
anya-e0703n:12370: Accaye pituno rājā, uparājā ahosi so;
anya-e0703n:12373: Senā nāmasi sappaññā, mahesī tassa rājino;
anya-e0703n:12379: Datvā ṭhānantaraṃ rājā, tesaṃ tesaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12382: Atha kenāpi so gantvā, hetunā maṇihīrakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12383: Vasanto kira assosi, paccanto kupito iti.
anya-e0703n:12386: Gantvā sādhetha taṃ desa-mīti pesesi sajjukaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12389: Vatvā yaṃkiñci bhindiṃsu, te ubhopi narādhipe.
anya-e0703n:12391: Tato dve verino hutvā, desaṃ gaṇhitumārabhuṃ;
anya-e0703n:12394: Te ubho tattha ghātetvā, tesaṃ sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n:12395: Hantvā taṃ pakkhiye sabbe, puḷatthinagaraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n:12401: Disvā rājāpi santuṭṭho, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathārahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12403: Tena mettiṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ, dhītaraṃ deva nāmikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12421: Pāsāde cetiyo ceva, vihāre ca anappake;
anya-e0703n:12433: Pitarā ca mahādānaṃ, puññamaññampi vā kataṃ;
anya-e0703n:12434: Sabbaṃ tamavināsetvā, niccaṃ so rakkhi sādaro.
anya-e0703n:12440: Bhikkhusaṅghassa sā gāmaṃ, mahummārañca tassa dā.
anya-e0703n:12446: Datvā te me cayitvāna, vihārasseva dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:12449: Nānārāge dhaje ceva, paṭākāyo ca pūjayi.
anya-e0703n:12470: Puññanti vuttaṃ sabbaṃ so, na kiñci parivajjayi.
anya-e0703n:12473: Bhojanaṃ bhojanatthīnaṃ, bahu so dāsi rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12478: Evaṃ puññāni katvāna, narindo so sapāriso;
anya-e0703n:12481: Tato tassa suto āsi, sīhaḷānaṃ rathesato;
anya-e0703n:12488: Sabbaṃ kāsi ahāpetvā, adhammaṃ tu vivajjayi.
anya-e0703n:12494: Rajjaṃ katvāna catūsu, vassesu nidhanaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:12496: Aggabodhi tato rājā, chattaṃ ussāpayi pure;
anya-e0703n:12503: Nāmaṃ gahetvā pituno, attano ca narādhipo.
anya-e0703n:12514: Bhikkhū vā cetiye vā so, vanditvā nikkhamaṃ tato;
anya-e0703n:12515: Vālukā hā vinassantu, iti pādesu vodhayī.
anya-e0703n:12517: Yaṃ yaṃ sovaggiyaṃ kammaṃ, kammaṃ nissaraṇavahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12518: Vatthuttaye pasanno so, kammaṃ taṃ sabbamācari.
anya-e0703n:12521: Gantvā tassā upaṭṭhānaṃ, pātova kira bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:12529: Tassa toyena siñcitvā, sīsaṃ samakuṭaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12530: Gandhamālāhi taṃ sammā, cetiyaṃ viha pūjiya.
anya-e0703n:12532: Namassitvāna tikkhattuṃ, katvā taṃ so padakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12550: Ṭhatvā adassane ṭhāne, tikkhattuṃ puna vandiya;
anya-e0703n:12551: Santuṭṭho tena kammena, saranto taṃ punappunaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12560: Evaṃ puññaparo hutvā, katvā dīpassa saṅgahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12569: So te disvā pavattiṃ taṃ, sutvā datvā mahābalaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12571: Pāhesi pitarā yuddhaṃ, kātuṃ bandhu hite rate;
anya-e0703n:12575: Te ubhopi palāyiṃsu, datvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12580: Yujjhanto maraṇaṃ gañchi, ñātisopi mato kira;
anya-e0703n:12584: So dappuḷaṃ ṭhapetvāna, sevatthaṃ tassa rājino.
anya-e0703n:12590: Rājākāsi dumindassa, gharaṃ jiṇṇaṃ navaṃ thiraṃ.
anya-e0703n:12592: Sovaṇṇakhacitaṃ kammaṃ, maṅgalena ca tassa so;
anya-e0703n:12599: Vihāre jetanāme ca, katvā sovaṇṇayaṃ muniṃ.
anya-e0703n:12617: Tasmiṃ rājini sampatte, devalokaṃ tadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:12640: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ yāguṃ, sabbe gaṇhiṃsu sādarā;
anya-e0703n:12644: Evamādiṃ sa katvāna, puññavaṃ vassehi tīhi ca.
anya-e0703n:12647: Rājā dibbena yānena, gacchanto viya so mari.
anya-e0703n:12659: Tato tassā’nujo seno, chattaṃ ussāpayī pure;
anya-e0703n:12660: Piyaṃ’va puttaṃ passanto, satte sabbe mahādhano.
anya-e0703n:12686: Rājā tasmiṃ akujjhitvā, sandhiṃ katvā akuppiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12689: Evaṃ samaggā te āsuṃ, tato paṭṭhāya khattiyā;
anya-e0703n:12701: Vasantā damiḷā ettha, bahavo ye tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:12702: Sabbe taṃ pakkhiyāhesuṃ, tato so balavā ahu.
anya-e0703n:12716: Rājā senāya bhinnattaṃ, sukkā sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n:12722: Ekename na sakkā ve, sabbe etehi mārituṃ;
anya-e0703n:12723: Etesaṃ na ca nīcānaṃ, hatthesu maraṇaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:12725: Tasmā varaṃ me maraṇaṃ, mayā eveti cintiya;
anya-e0703n:12728: Taṃ disvā bahavo sīse, tattha chindiṃsu sevakā;
anya-e0703n:12729: Taṃ disvā damiḷī senā, haṭṭhatuṭṭhā pamodisā.
anya-e0703n:12737: Supaṇṇo viya gaṇhanto, bhūjagena salilāla ye;
anya-e0703n:12738: So taṃ sabbaṃ nivattesi, attānañca sugopayi.
anya-e0703n:12743: Kiṃ me ekena verinaṃ, pūritena manorathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12752: So taṃ disvā ca jhāpetvā, rājūnaṃ paṇḍudesinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12762: Suvaṇṇa paṭimāyo ca, vihāresu tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:12764: Sabbaṃ gahetvā nissāraṃ, laṅkādīpa makāsi so;
anya-e0703n:12767: Rājā’pi rakkhaṃ datvāna, mahāmagge tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:12771: Amacce tattha pesesi, disvā te sīhalādhipo.
anya-e0703n:12773: Suṇitvā sāsanaṃ tesaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sampaṭicchiya;
anya-e0703n:12782: Nikkhamitvā purā gantvā, na cireneva paṭṭanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12783: Tattha āruyha nāvaṃ so, saka desa mupāgami.
anya-e0703n:12788: Bhātaraṃ dutiyaṃ katvā, udayaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12791: Sopi kho na cireneva, katvā puññaṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12800: Yo senaṃ sabbapaṭhamo, seno nāma kumārako;
anya-e0703n:12809: Tadā jeṭṭhasutaṃ tassa, mahindaṃ nāma khattiyaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12820: Tato kassapanāmaṃ so, tesaṃ jeṭṭhaṃ narissaro;
anya-e0703n:12821: Desaṃ taṃ gaṇha yāhīti, datvā balamapesayi.
anya-e0703n:12823: So’pi gantvāna taṃ hantvā, rohaṇaṃ kasiṇampi taṃ;
anya-e0703n:12826: Atha so bhātaro dve’pi, senañca udayaṃ tathā;
anya-e0703n:12829: Rājā tā sādhu vaḍḍhetvā, vayapattāsu tīsu so;
anya-e0703n:12841: Evaṃ karonto ñātīnaṃ, saṃgahaṃ so yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12851: Ārāmike ca bahavo, dāse kammakarepi ca.
anya-e0703n:12856: Vaḍḍhetvā tattha kāretvā, sabba sovaṇṇayaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12866: Saddhiṃ so saṅghanāmāya, deviyāpi ca attano.
anya-e0703n:12899: Mahādevena so āsi, rammo dappula pabbato.
anya-e0703n:12902: Ubhopi te vippakate, rājā so vasamāpayi.
anya-e0703n:12913: Tato vīsati vassesu, pulatthi nagare vasaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12917: Pahāya dīpaṃ dīpo’va, mahāvāta hato gato.
anya-e0703n:12929: Evaṃ tasmiṃ mate tassa, kātabbaṃ sādhukāriya;
anya-e0703n:12932: Āgamma nagaraṃ rājā, ahosi dharaṇī tale;
anya-e0703n:12944: Bhariyā tassa yā āsi, saṅghātaṃ so bhisecayi;
anya-e0703n:12947: Mahindaṃ nāma sappaññaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ bhātaraṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:12953: Uppajjittha tadā putto, rañño saṅghāya deviyā;
anya-e0703n:12968: Nikāyattaya vā sīhi, saddhiṃ bhikkhūhi āgato;
anya-e0703n:12971: Yā tassa yuvarājassa, bhariyā tissā nāmikā;
anya-e0703n:12974: Kittināmā’parāyā ca, bhariyā sāpi kho pana;
anya-e0703n:12975: Vijāyi putte cattāro, tathā ekañca dhītaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:12977: Tadā rājāpi cintetvā, evaṃ sati kaṇiṭṭhako;
anya-e0703n:12978: Nissaṅko mayi hotīti, sammā mantīhi mantiya.
anya-e0703n:12996: Suññaṃ piṭṭhaṃ sayaṃ disvā, kasmā evanti saṃvadi.
anya-e0703n:13002: Sabbaṃ sāragataṃ dīpe, samādāya gato iti.
anya-e0703n:13004: Taṃ sutvā lajjito rājā, sayaṃ viya parājito;
anya-e0703n:13010: Rājā disvā’ti santuṭṭho, kattabbaṃ tassa kāriya;
anya-e0703n:13019: Ratanaṃ sabbamādāya, datvā rajjaṃ imassa ca;
anya-e0703n:13035: Vegasā taṃ samāgamma, yuddhaṃ kātuṃ samārabhi.
anya-e0703n:13037: Asampuṇṇa balattā so, viddho sallena bhūpati;
anya-e0703n:13049: Sāraṃ sabbaṃsamādāya, dese ca nagare ṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13052: Paṇḍurāja kumāraṃ tu, tattha rajje’bhi siñciya;
anya-e0703n:13056: Tattha tattha yathā kāmaṃ, vasanto akuto bhayo.
anya-e0703n:13059: Kīḷanto viya nāvaṃ so, samāruyha visārado.
anya-e0703n:13062: Taṃ sāsanaṃ nivedetvā, sāraṃ dassesi āhaṭaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13064: Rājā sādhūti vatvāna, kāretvā tassa saṅgahaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13065: Saddhiṃ senāya āgantvā, pakaṭṭhāya sakaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:13070: Sabbaṃ pākatikaṃ kāsi, sāraṃ dīpe nirālayo;
anya-e0703n:13079: Khinnā pubbassa rājassa, kāle dīpamhi pāṇino;
anya-e0703n:13080: Nibbutā taṃ samāgamma, ghammā viya valāhakā.
anya-e0703n:13088: Bodhigehaṃ karonto taṃ, disvā vaḍḍhakīno tadā;
anya-e0703n:13092: So taṃ taṃ mupasaṃkamma, mahāpūjāya pūjiya.
anya-e0703n:13097: Sākhā gacchaṃ tu uddhaṃva, kātuṃ sakkā yathāgharaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13112: Evaṃ khuddānu khuddāni, katvā puññāni so vibhū;
anya-e0703n:13116: Tassa ṭhāne ṭhapetvāna, sabbaṃ tasseva tassadā.
anya-e0703n:13137: Tuccho yaṃ neva hotūti, vāsaṃ saṅghassa taṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:13139: Bhogagāme ca tassadā, rakkhake ca niyojayi;
anya-e0703n:13160: Rāja taṃ bodhisattañca, sagharaṃ tattha sannahi;
anya-e0703n:13179: Annaṃ pānañca vatthañca, tesaṃ datvā yathāruciṃ.
anya-e0703n:13184: Tassa rañño mahesī ca, saṅghanāmā akārayi;
anya-e0703n:13196: Tato tassā’nujo āsi, udayo nāma khattiyo;
anya-e0703n:13199: Hutvā so sayaṃ rājā, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ sakabhātaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:13202: Rājā cintiya ñātīnaṃ, kātabbo saṅgaho iti;
anya-e0703n:13214: Janaṃ hattagataṃ katvā, desaṃ sabbaṃ vināsiya;
anya-e0703n:13218: Ānetuṃ tamupāyaṃ so, gavesanto tathā tathā.
anya-e0703n:13221: Āmantesi mahāpuñña, sahāyo hoti me iti.
anya-e0703n:13224: Putto tava mahindo so, vuddhippatto mahābalo.
anya-e0703n:13232: Taṃ sutvā vacanaṃ rañño, kassapo bhāsi sādaro;
anya-e0703n:13233: Deva devena vutto’haṃ, gaccheyyaṃ kintu me suto.
anya-e0703n:13235: Vaṃso me pālito hoti, pasādo ca tavādhipa;
anya-e0703n:13236: Tasmā kālamahāpetvā, yaṃ icchasi tathā kuru.
anya-e0703n:13238: Sutvā atīvasantuṭṭho, narindo tassa taṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n:13244: Tucchaṃ viya puraṃ katvā, sabbañca balavāhanaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13254: Tato jānapadā sabbe, maṇḍalikā ca raṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n:13257: Gantvā taṃ parivāresuṃ, laddho no sāmiko iti.
anya-e0703n:13259: Patanto sopi kho coro, ṭhitova girimaṇḍale;
anya-e0703n:13263: Mahindasenā ghātentī, tassa senaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ.
anya-e0703n:13266: Disvā malayapādamhi, gahetvā ettha so iti.
anya-e0703n:13277: Tamādāya’ti tuṭṭho so, jano āgamma sajjukaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13295: Duṭṭhe ca paṭibāhetvā, maṇḍalīke ca raṭṭhiye.
anya-e0703n:13309: Rājāpi disvā taṃ kuddho, khippaṃ pakkhippa cārake;
anya-e0703n:13312: Adāsi ca tulābhāraṃ, tikkhattuṃ so mahāyaso;
anya-e0703n:13346: Tato rajje patiṭṭhāya, kassapo dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13353: Dānaṃ daṇḍissaraṃ nāma, sadā dāpesi bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:13360: Taṃ sutvā kupito rājā, balaṃ pesesi attano;
anya-e0703n:13361: Yujjhitvā taṃ parājesi, mahindo so mahābhaṭo.
anya-e0703n:13363: Tato rājā nivattetuṃ, pitaraṃ tassa pesayi;
anya-e0703n:13364: Kassapaṃ yuvarājaṃ taṃ, so gantvā puttasantikaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13369: Ādipādo tu so pacchā, ghātetvā maṇḍalādhipe;
anya-e0703n:13373: Datvā so dhītaraṃ tassā, pesesi puna rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13376: Gāhāpesi nave bhikkhū, āvāse tattha tattha so.
anya-e0703n:13381: Akāsi ca nikāyesu, tīsu bimbe silāmaye;
anya-e0703n:13390: Thale jale ca sattānaṃ, adāsi abhayaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:13403: Ekamekaṃ kuṭiṃ katvā, dāpesi ca camūpati.
anya-e0703n:13405: Rattamālagirismiṃ so, katvā rammaṃ taraṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13426: Bhesajjagehaṃ kāresi, nagare tattha tattha so;
anya-e0703n:13442: Bhikkhūnaṃ so adā sādhu, ṭhapetvā vattamuttamaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13454: Yathā kammaṃ gato ṭhatvā, vassāni dasasatta ca.
anya-e0703n:13460: Vattā so maramantiva, cāgavā dhanado viya.
anya-e0703n:13471: Bhūmicando narindo so, vaṃse jātassa attano;
anya-e0703n:13477: So dhetvā sāsanaṃ sabbaṃ, dhammakammena satthuno;
anya-e0703n:13517: Nagare vajjasālā ca, tesaṃ gāme ca dāpayi.
anya-e0703n:13544: Akāsi pāḷikaṃ nāma, pāsādaṃ sumano haraṃ.
anya-e0703n:13549: Tassā puttosi siddhattho, nāma issariye ṭhito;
anya-e0703n:13552: Rājā tasmiṃ mate katvā, sālaṃ bhikkhunamuttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13555: Evaṃ dhammena kārente, rajjaṃ laṅkādīpe tadā;
anya-e0703n:13583: Vaḍḍhesi tena taṃ puttaṃ, katvā senāya nāyakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13588: Sāsanassa ca lokassa, santiṃ katvā anekadhā;
anya-e0703n:13589: Rājā so dasame vasse, sukhena tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:13592: Vattāvādī kavī so satidhītivisado desako bhāvako ca;
anya-e0703n:13594: Rājindo kassapo’yaṃ viya vimalaguṇo hotulokopi sabbo.
anya-e0703n:13608: Rājā so sattame māse, paviṭṭho paccuno mukhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13617: Mahābhogaṃ adā tassa, nivāsesi purā bahi.
anya-e0703n:13631: Āvāsaṃ rakkhako nāma, tassa senāpatī akā;
anya-e0703n:13634: Kataṃ taṃ pubbarājehi, rājā so paripāliya;
anya-e0703n:13646: Tadā jānapadā ceva, nāgarā ca balāni ca;
anya-e0703n:13655: Taṃ sutvā yuvarājā ca, ādipādo ca taṃ sakhā;
anya-e0703n:13662: Yatīnaṃ purato tesaṃ, nipajjitvā urena te.
anya-e0703n:13677: Ādāya te vanaṃ tesaṃ, netvā rājagharaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:13682: Laṃkābhisekaṃ patvāna, seno so matimā tato;
anya-e0703n:13683: Udayaṃ ādipādaṃ taṃ, yuvarājaṃ akā sakhaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13707: Pariveṇaṃ nāgasālaṃ, disvā gāma madā tadā.
anya-e0703n:13710: Maṇḍapāni ca rammāni, dhātupūjaṃ akā sadā.
anya-e0703n:13718: Niddālu majjapo āsi, rājā pāpena jantunaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13724: Tāni nādāsi so rājā, tena coḷo mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:13727: Tadā senāpati ettha, paccante kupite gato;
anya-e0703n:13730: Hato senāpati tattha, yujjhi na raṇe mato;
anya-e0703n:13731: Kakūṭādīni ādāya, rājā so rohaṇaṃ agā.
anya-e0703n:13734: Nivattitvā sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, agamāsi idhatā bhayā.
anya-e0703n:13755: Bhutvā niggahasaṅgahehi sakalaṃ lokaṃ vase vattiya;
anya-e0703n:13757: Iccevaṃ satataṃ sarantu sujanā hātuṃ pamādaṃ madaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13764: Tato laṅkābhisekaṃ so, patvā seno kamāgataṃ;
anya-e0703n:13768: Yutto dayāya mettāya, rājā so sabbadā ahu.
anya-e0703n:13771: Raṭṭhe tasmiṃ vasantā’suṃ, sukhitā nibbhayā sadā.
anya-e0703n:13792: Tassā puttā duve jātā, dhītā ekā manoramā.
anya-e0703n:13798: Pesesi nāgadīpaṃ so, sutvā taṃ bhūpati idha.
anya-e0703n:13804: Yujjhitvā taṃ vināsetvā, gaṇhi so yuddhamaṇḍale.
anya-e0703n:13806: Asakkento imaṃ jetuṃ, rājā naṃ vallabhādayo;
anya-e0703n:13812: Saddhammaṃ kathāyantānaṃ, katvā sammā na muttamaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13813: Dhammaṃ sutvāna so rājā, pasanno buddhasāsane.
anya-e0703n:13819: Dāpesi vipulaṃ suddhaṃ, sadā ekadine viya.
anya-e0703n:13822: Pesesi bhojanaṃ suddhaṃ, mahagghaṃ vipulaṃ sadā.
anya-e0703n:13866: Kathāpesi ca bhikkhūhi, byattehi vinayaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:13878: Tassa vatthāni bhājetvā, bhikkhūnaṃ dāpayī sayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13880: Sadā so attano rajje, uyyānesu tahiṃtahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:13896: Catunnaṃ cetiyānaṃ so, ramanīyaṃ gharaṃ akā.
anya-e0703n:13916: Sā tasmiṃ pariveṇe ca, akā kappāsagāmake;
anya-e0703n:13932: Katvā soḷasame vasse, rājā so tidivaṃ gato.
anya-e0703n:13934: Jāto paṭicca taṃ rājaṃ, senā dvādasavassiko;
anya-e0703n:13938: Pitu senāpati seno, tassa senāpati ahu.
anya-e0703n:13941: Mātarā saha vattantaṃ, kaṇiṭṭhaṃ tassa bhātaraṃ.
anya-e0703n:13946: Taṃ sutvā kupito hutvā, seno senāpati tadā;
anya-e0703n:13950: Rakkhāmi taṃ amaccanti, gato nikkhamma rohaṇaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13958: Yujjhituṃ tena so rājā, balaṃ pesesi rohaṇā;
anya-e0703n:13959: Senāpati vināsesi, sabbaṃ taṃ rājino balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:13961: Damiḷā te janapadaṃ, pīḷetvā rakkhasā viya;
anya-e0703n:13965: Nivedesuṃ pavattiṃ taṃ, mantetvā sacīvehi so.
anya-e0703n:13973: Vasante tattha laṃkinde, ahitā vallabhā janā;
anya-e0703n:13976: Majjapāne guṇaṃ vatvā, pāyesuṃ taṃ mahīpatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:13977: Pivitvā majjapānaṃ so, mattabyāḷo ahu tadā.
anya-e0703n:13979: Āhārānaṃ khayaṃ patvā, cajitvā dullabhaṃ padaṃ;
anya-e0703n:13980: Mato so dasame vasse, taruṇoyeva bhūpati.
anya-e0703n:13991: Mahindo taṃ kaṇiṭṭho so, rājaputto tadaccaye;
anya-e0703n:14000: Accantaṃ khīṇacitto so, vassamhi dasame vibhū;
anya-e0703n:14003: Aladdha vuttino sabbe, keraḷā sahitā tato;
anya-e0703n:14004: Na vuttidānaṃ no yāva, hoti mātāva bhuñjatu.
anya-e0703n:14013: Bhātu jāyamma hesitte, ṭhapetvā so tahiṃ vasī.
anya-e0703n:14024: Tato sesesu ṭhānesu, keraḷā sīhaḷā tadā;
anya-e0703n:14031: Balaṃ mahantaṃ balavā, taṃ khippaṃ laṃkamotari.
anya-e0703n:14036: Chattiṃse rājino vasse, mahesiṃ ratanāni ca;
anya-e0703n:14045: Mahīpālaṃ dhanaṃ tañca, sabbaṃ hatthagataṃ tato;
anya-e0703n:14051: Bhinditvā sahasā sabbe, vihāre ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e0703n:14064: Sabbaṃ te rohaṇaṃ desaṃ, saṅkhobhesu mito tato.
anya-e0703n:14073: Katvā chamāsaṃ saṅgāmaṃ, haniṃsu damiḷe bahūṃ.
anya-e0703n:14078: Kumāro jayito disvā, ubho te sacive tadā;
anya-e0703n:14081: Buddho paveṇigāmaṃ so, varaṃ yācittha kittiko;
anya-e0703n:14082: Saṅghikaṃ gahitaṃ bhāgaṃ, vissajjetuṃ varaṃ vari.
anya-e0703n:14085: Niddarā sādarā vīrā, pāde vandiṃsu tassa te.
anya-e0703n:14103: So rājā damiḷe hantuṃ, dhanaṃ sañciya’nekādhā;
anya-e0703n:14109: Na yāva rājaraṭṭhassa, gahaṇaṃ hoti tāva me;
anya-e0703n:14115: Yujjhituṃ samayo neti, dvādase vacchare lahuṃ;
anya-e0703n:14125: Sahatthena sakaṃ sīsaṃ, chinditvā sahasā mari.
anya-e0703n:14130: Bhayā saraṭṭhaṃ hitvā’tha, duṭṭhadese vasaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:14140: Tato cattāri vassāni, rajjaṃ kāresi rohaṇe.
anya-e0703n:14142: Tampi coḷāraṇe hantvā, mahesiṃ dhītarā saha;
anya-e0703n:14146: Akā vassadvayaṃ coḷā, ghātesuṃ tampi yujjhiya.
anya-e0703n:14182: Tato bhāviniṃ siddhi, mapekkhaṃ nayanaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14186: Varaṃ padāya nabhasā, rājamāno gato tato.
anya-e0703n:14198: Pāletu iti so rajjaṃ, sampattaṃ sampaṭikkhipi.
anya-e0703n:14216: Katvā taṃ pariveṇassa, sāmikaṃ dharaṇī pati.
anya-e0703n:14219: Parihāre adā tassa, pessavagge ca pañca so.
anya-e0703n:14225: Rājā ca lokaṃ pālesi, sammā tassānusiṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0703n:14237: Devalā lokikā cāti, nāmato vissutā subhā.
anya-e0703n:14242: Sā moggallāna lokavhe, putte dve labhi sobhane;
anya-e0703n:14252: Guṇaṃ sabbattha vaṇṇesuṃ, tasmiṃ devā pasīdiya.
anya-e0703n:14254: Guṇaṃ suṇitvā laṃkindo, tadā sabbattha patthaṭaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14266: Yato bhikkhū samūhetvā, vāsaṃ kappesi yattha so;
anya-e0703n:14281: Sā taṃ paṭicca kittiñca, mittaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14282: Mahindaṃ rakkhitaṃ cāpi, latittha caturo pajā.
anya-e0703n:14294: Kittādike jane neke, vase vattiya sabbathā.
anya-e0703n:14300: Saṅgho nāma kumārassa, sarūpaṃ sādhuvaṃ bravi.
anya-e0703n:14308: Tassa so vacanaṃ sutvā, sevitabbo kumārako;
anya-e0703n:14311: Suṇitvā so vaco tesaṃ, nivattanabhayā vibhū;
anya-e0703n:14317: Tahiṃ so nivasaṃ vīro, pesayitvā sasevake;
anya-e0703n:14320: Tato’bhimānī senānī, senaṃ so tattha pesayi;
anya-e0703n:14329: Tadāpi senaṃ senindo, pesetvā asakiṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14347: Lokanāmo camūnātho, lokaṃ hitvā sakaṃ tadā;
anya-e0703n:14356: Kesādhātu tato yuddhe, bhinditvā damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14365: Pavattiṃ taṃ suṇitvā so, sābhimāno bhusaṃtato;
anya-e0703n:14372: Dukkaraṃ ettha yuddhanti, gato so khadiraṅgaṇiṃ.
anya-e0703n:14400: Caturo caturopāye, yo jayaṃ tattha so vasī.
anya-e0703n:14424: Upaggamma janā sabbe, karaṃ no denti sabbaso.
anya-e0703n:14430: Senaṃ mahantiṃ datvāna, pesesi sacivaṃ nijaṃ.
anya-e0703n:14450: Rañño bhaṭā vināsetvā, sabbaṃ taṃ damiḷaṃ balaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14456: Tahiṃ taṃ sakalaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, netvā rañño padassiya;
anya-e0703n:14459: Mahīpālopi taṃ sutvā, sacivānaṃ vaco tadā;
anya-e0703n:14468: Taṃ vijāniya bhūmindo, senindaṃ pesayī sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14474: Patiṃsu tasmiṃ saṅgāme, bhūpālassa narā bahū;
anya-e0703n:14495: Atho laṃkissaro tattha, khippaṃ gantvā mahabbalo;
anya-e0703n:14499: Ṭhānā kubulagallā ca, yujjhanto taṃ palāpayi.
anya-e0703n:14504: Tadā narissaro tata, tassa sabbaṃ samādiya;
anya-e0703n:14510: Tato rājā samavhāya, sacīve dve mahabbale;
anya-e0703n:14511: Pesesi dikkhiṇaṃ passaṃ, vasaṃ netuṃ tahiṃ jane.
anya-e0703n:14532: Vikkamāti sayaṃ sutvā, kālaññū so mahīpahi.
anya-e0703n:14543: Tattha tattha ṭhitā sūrā, coḷā ye kakkhalā’khilā;
anya-e0703n:14546: Nikkhamma nagarā gantvā, coḷā bahi mahāraṇaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14547: Katvā parājitā bhītā, pavissa nagaraṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:14565: Sīhaḷā balavantoti, bhiyyo senaṃ na pāhiṇi.
anya-e0703n:14593: Pulatthinagaraṃ gañchi, vase vattiya taṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:14608: Datvāna dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, taṃ saṅgaṇhi yathāvidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n:14614: Datvā rajje yathāñāyaṃ, karaṃ yojesi gaṇhituṃ.
anya-e0703n:14623: Tatheva seṭṭhinātho ca, iccete bhātaro tayo.
anya-e0703n:14628: Te sabbe rohaṇaṃ raṭṭhaṃ, sabbaṃ malayamaṇḍalaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14632: Nighātento bahū tattha, tattha paccatthike jane.
anya-e0703n:14635: Dakkhiṇo dakkhiṇaṃ desaṃ, sayaṃ gantvā mahabbalo.
anya-e0703n:14649: Sutvā vaṃsakkamaṃ tassā, so ñatvā suddhavaṃsataṃ;
anya-e0703n:14652: Sā taṃ paṭicca rājānaṃ, mahesī dhītaraṃ labhi;
anya-e0703n:14656: Vīravammassa pādāsi, sā labhi dhītaro duve.
anya-e0703n:14658: Samānanāmikā jeṭṭhā, sā mātā mahiyā ahu;
anya-e0703n:14659: Sugalā nāmikā āsi, tāsu dvīsu kaṇiṭṭhikā.
anya-e0703n:14667: Subhaddā ca sumittā ca, lokanāthavhayāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:14671: Sampattā sā pajavuddhiṃ, haranti rājino mataṃ.
anya-e0703n:14674: Gabbho jātumahīpālaṃ, taṃ paṭicca na saṇṭhahi.
anya-e0703n:14686: Bhūte ca bhāvino ceva, sabbe bhūpe’tisāyino.
anya-e0703n:14716: Tesaṃ pādāsi paccekaṃ, vuttiṃ so anurūpakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:14725: Saha bhogena pādāsi, tadā bandhu hiterato.
anya-e0703n:14737: Vicinitvā kulīne so, jane sabbe samādiya;
anya-e0703n:14815: Attano visayaṃ patte, coḷo sīhaḷa dūtake;
anya-e0703n:14822: Avhāya damiḷe dūte, iti coḷassa sandisi.
anya-e0703n:14824: Senaṃ vinā’va ekasmiṃ, dīpe majjhe mahaṇṇave;
anya-e0703n:14827: Balaṃ sannayha sakalaṃ, rajje tuyhaṃ mamā’tha vā;
anya-e0703n:14831: Iti vatvāna te dūte, itthalaṅkāra maṇḍite.
anya-e0703n:14848: Puttehi tīhi sahitaṃ, rājino ca kaṇīyasiṃ;
anya-e0703n:14851: Rājā nikkhamma khippaṃ so, gantvā dakkhiṇapassakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:14887: Etā caññā ca so chinna-mariyādā vāpiyo bahū;
anya-e0703n:14921: Paṭisaṅkharijiṇṇe so, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ.
anya-e0703n:14930: Gāme datvāna paccekaṃ, sālāyo cāpi kārayi.
anya-e0703n:14932: Anāgate taṃ bhūpālā, mā gaṇhantū’ti lekhiya;
anya-e0703n:14939: Bandhūnampi ca so tesaṃ, bhogagāme padāpayi.
anya-e0703n:14950: Padinnā pubbarājūhi, ye gāmā rohaṇe bahū;
anya-e0703n:14951: Tepi sabbe anūne so, yathāpubbaṃ ṭhapesi ca.
anya-e0703n:14954: Bhattaṃ cā’dāsi so kāka soṇādīnaṃ dayāparo.
anya-e0703n:14962: Andhānaṃ paṅgulānañca, gāme cā’dā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n:14986: Tadā neke ca sacivā, tasso rodhajanāpi ca;
anya-e0703n:14996: Gajabāhū’ti vidite, tassa jāte sute tato.
anya-e0703n:14999: Rohaṇaṃ kasiṇaṃ datvā, tahiṃ vāsāya pesayi.
anya-e0703n:15001: Tato so tattha gantvāna, mahānāgahulaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:15007: Saggaṃ lokaṃ sapuññappabhavamuruphalaṃ passituṃ cā’ru roha.
anya-e0703n:15014: Tadārañño nujāmittā, tassa puttā tayo’pi ca;
anya-e0703n:15039: Tā tassāḷāhanaṭṭhāna dassane neva so ahaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15041: Sokabhāraṃ vinodessaṃ, mama ceto gataṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:15053: Tayo te bhātaro tattha, sampattāva jayā tato;
anya-e0703n:15057: Saṅgāmesuṃ parājesi, bhiyyo yujjhittha so tayo.
anya-e0703n:15092: Mātā ca tiṇṇaṃ bhātūnaṃ, jayabāhu ca bhūmipo;
anya-e0703n:15107: Sutvā tamatthaṃ dūtehi, so vikkamabhujopi ca;
anya-e0703n:15113: Ripavo dāni me sabbe, ummūlessāmahaṃ iti;
anya-e0703n:15117: Khippaṃ pāvekkhi kalyāṇiṃ, so’pi te gahaṇatthiko.
anya-e0703n:15125: So vikkamabhujo sutvā, pavattiṃ bhūbhujo tadā;
anya-e0703n:15140: Palāyamāno so bhīto, āgantvāna nijaṃ puraṃ;
anya-e0703n:15147: Pesayitvā sakaṃ sopi, mahantaṃ sakalaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15156: Āvasiṃsu yathāpubbaṃ, gantvā raṭṭhaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15183: Paṭimāyo ca acchijja, yathākāmaṃ vayaṃ nayī.
anya-e0703n:15204: Aggiṃ dentā taḷāke ca, chindantā jalapūrite.
anya-e0703n:15207: Chindantā nāḷikerādi, so pakāre ca bhūruhe.
anya-e0703n:15228: Iti vattabba taṃyeva, yātaṃ laṅkātalaṃ tadā.
anya-e0703n:15230: Evaṃ gāmakabhojakā viya bhusaṃtejo vihīnā sadā;
anya-e0703n:15242: Mittāvhā rājinī ceva, tadā kālamakaṃsu te.
anya-e0703n:15263: Na dissate pātubhāvo, aho no appapuññatā.
anya-e0703n:15323: Nemittake ca pucchiṃsu, sunitvā te pamoditā.
anya-e0703n:15328: Taṃ suṇitvā amaccā ca, tathā nagaravāsino;
anya-e0703n:15340: Suvinaṭṭhe vihāre ca, dhātugabbhe ca vāpiyo;
anya-e0703n:15344: Na ciraṃ saṇṭhahi gabbha-varo kucchimhi deviyā.
anya-e0703n:15352: Suppasannā asesā ca, disāyo taṃkhaṇe ahu;
anya-e0703n:15388: Te santappiya bhogehi, bhiyyo pucchittha sādaraṃ;
anya-e0703n:15409: Hāni yākācisatataṃ, yathā tassa na hessati;
anya-e0703n:15413: Sabbathā na samatthoyaṃ, putto gajabāhu mama.
anya-e0703n:15416: Nihīno mātugottena, na rajjassa raho mama.
anya-e0703n:15421: Itipesesi dūte so, ānetuṃ taṃ kumārakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15425: Tassetaṃ vacanaṃ yuttaṃ, vuttaṃ mehita buddhiyā.
anya-e0703n:15430: Kiñca tattha kumāramhi, nīte vikkama bāhuno;
anya-e0703n:15436: Iti hatthe gatānaṃ so, dūtānaṃ thanayaṃ sakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15449: Sutvā dve bhātaro aññe, jeṭṭhasso paratiṃsadā;
anya-e0703n:15450: Khippaṃ saraṭṭhā āgamma, kāresuṃ antimaṃ vidhiṃ.
anya-e0703n:15455: Datvā raṭṭhadvayaṃ aññaṃ, vatthuṃ tattheva ādisi;
anya-e0703n:15459: Dhītaro dve ca gantāna, mahā nāmahulaṃ puraṃ.
anya-e0703n:15474: Mayhaṃ eso nirālambo, putto hehīti sabbathā.
anya-e0703n:15476: Tasmā me sunūno esā, dātuṃ yuttā kumārikā;
anya-e0703n:15491: Tuyhaṃ jātoti amhākaṃ, sambandho so kathaṃ siyā;
anya-e0703n:15494: Evaṃ so deviyā tāya, nekaso vārayantiyā;
anya-e0703n:15510: Mūlarajjādhipaccaṃ taṃ, ammaṃ nindākaraṃ na hi.
anya-e0703n:15516: Pasayha tāva taṃ rajjaṃ, vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ iti.
anya-e0703n:15518: Velakkāra balaṃ sabbaṃ, bhindiṃsu dhana dānato;
anya-e0703n:15522: Ubhinnaṃ rājūnaṃ dūte, pesayuṃ nekaso tato.
anya-e0703n:15524: Rajjaṃ sādhetvā dassāma, ekībhūtā mayaṃ pana;
anya-e0703n:15527: Tato dve bhātukā senaṃ, sakaṃ sannayha vegasā;
anya-e0703n:15530: Pahiṇiṃsu ca te dūte, tato gajabohuvhayo;
anya-e0703n:15534: Rājāno dve ca no raṭṭhaṃ, saṅgāmatthamupāgatā.
anya-e0703n:15536: Paṭhamaṃ tesu pakkhassa, ekassa balino bhusaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15537: Mukhabhaṅge kate khippaṃ, tato aññe susādhiyā.
anya-e0703n:15546: Tatova so nivattitvā, sakaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gato lahuṃ.
anya-e0703n:15557: Raṭṭhe sake sakeyeva, tato pabhūti bhūmipā;
anya-e0703n:15570: Paccante īdise dese, kathaṃ nāma vasissare.
anya-e0703n:15596: Janassa balato tassa, passato locanehi so;
anya-e0703n:15600: Bherini dena pūrento, disā dasa samantato.
anya-e0703n:15631: Piyena viya mittena, tena saddhiṃ mahīpati.
anya-e0703n:15642: Gāmaṃ taṃ sādhukaṃ sajju, sajjāpetvā saputtakaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15645: Pitā putto ubho tassa, sambhāsiya piyaṃ vaco;
anya-e0703n:15679: Puttena saha so saṅkha-tthali nāmaṃ puraṃ gami.
anya-e0703n:15687: Suṇitvā tañca so amhaṃ, vaṃso jāto mahā’’iti;
anya-e0703n:15700: Khippaṃ kāretukāmo so, sayaṃ iti vicintayi.
anya-e0703n:15702: Kesa akkhaka gīvaṭṭhi-dāṭhā pattāna meva ca;
anya-e0703n:15711: Tayo me pitaro bhūpā, mātulopi ca sabbathā;
anya-e0703n:15720: Tesu kittisiri meghaṃ, petteyyaṃ me ṭhapetva te;
anya-e0703n:15727: Na heva asmiṃ lokasmiṃ, saṃvijjati kadācipi.
anya-e0703n:15754: Caritātisayaṃ kattuṃ, samatthā honti ye bhuvi.
anya-e0703n:15757: Yadihaṃ na karissāmi, moghā me jāti hessati.
anya-e0703n:15760: Mayā te adhikā kintu, paññādīhīti cintiya.
anya-e0703n:15766: Yathicchitañce na bhave, mahatī jāni me bhusaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15772: Adhippāyānurūpaṃ me, samatthā vā na vācarā.
anya-e0703n:15774: Ye keci’dha janā santi, sabbe te mama sammukhā;
anya-e0703n:15780: Sādhetuṃ dukkaraṃ raṭṭhaṃ, bhavate kākinā kathaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15790: Sabbametaṃ vaco jātu, saddhātabbaṃ siyā na hi.
anya-e0703n:15815: Taṃ khaṇaṃ purato ko’pi, saṅkhasaddo samuggato.
anya-e0703n:15817: Tato nekanimittaññū, kumāro taṃ suṇi tva so;
anya-e0703n:15832: Tahiṃ ṭhite so passitvā, ettakā kinnu āgatā;
anya-e0703n:15833: Iti pucchi kumārotha, tepi taṃ ida mabravuṃ.
anya-e0703n:15836: Kimeva muccate maccu-bhayaṃ kesaṃ na vijjati.
anya-e0703n:15839: Ajjāpi hi mukhe tuyhaṃ, khīragandho pavāyati.
anya-e0703n:15841: Na hevatthi visuṃ vitta-jātaṃ saṅgahitaṃ tava;
anya-e0703n:15848: Kāressati idaṃ nāma, sabbathā neva ñāyate.
anya-e0703n:15859: Nisamma tesaṃ vacanaṃ, vidhāya madhuraṃ sitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15863: Na jāniṃsu mamaṃ sabbe, yesañhi bhayamidisaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15865: Iti vatvā bhayaṃ tesaṃ, vinodetu mupaṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0703n:15871: Bāloti maṃ cintaya taṃ, jātā vo kumatīdisī;
anya-e0703n:15872: Parikkhīyati te jāṇā, navayo’ti na kiṃ sutaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15877: Karissanti yathā vedaṃ, bhayaṃ tumhe jahissatha;
anya-e0703n:15881: Anudhāvati maṃ tāta, setehi yadi vo bhayaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15883: Purato hotha tumhehi, vatvā te gahitāyudho;
anya-e0703n:15887: Aparaṃ ravi bimbaṃva, pacchimā sā mukhoditaṃ.
anya-e0703n:15910: Yathā na sahitā honti, ṭhapetabbā visuṃ visuṃ;
anya-e0703n:15913: Tathā senāpati katvā, vañcetuṃ taṃ mahāmatiṃ;
anya-e0703n:15914: Dassetvā’ti thīsakkāraṃ, rañño dūte sa pesayi.
anya-e0703n:15916: Kumāro’tha viditvāna, tena taṃ vañcanaṃ kataṃ;
anya-e0703n:15919: Icchitatthassa nipphatti, na me jātu bhavissati;
anya-e0703n:15926: Māraṇaṃ sāmino mayhaṃ, kiṃ nimittamīti bravi.
anya-e0703n:15931: Kumārassa mukhaṃ disvā, vedhamāno bhayena so;
anya-e0703n:15937: Niyogaṃ me vinā tena, kataṃ kammaṃ na yujjati;
